1332211.content:
Tomoyo had asked Sakura to pop round her house after school one Saturday and was happy for Kero to come along too, promising him cake. Once Sakura came round Tomoyo was all too eager to lead her best friend and true love up to her bedroom.

Once inside Tomoyo showed them a strawberry tart she baked and Kero was over the moon, until Sakura mentioned that there were more important things to come round for. Now Tomoyo brought out a tape measure to check Sakura's present height and compare it to her original measurements; Sakura was naturally embarrassed by the whole affair.

Once that was done Tomoyo now produced a new costume for Sakura to wear (it doesn't have to be the same one) and insisted that it be worn now. It wasn't until after she put it on that Sakura was wondering what the whole purpose was; of course Tomoyo just wanted to see her in it and imagine her using the cards while wearing it.

Just then Sakura sensed a Clow card inside the Daidouji mansion.
1332211.title: Tomoyo's 'Little Card' Episode

13322111.content:
Sakura released her sealing staff and was about to leave Tomoyo's bedroom to have a look round when she sensed it in the room with them. Kero also picked up on the card's presence. Just then a glowing yellow dot moved across the room like a flea, with Sakura catching sight of it and was beginning to think of how to subdue it until it jumped onto Tomoyo.

"Eh?" Tomoyo exclaimed in surprise as she fell over before the Clow card in question jumped away. Sakura was more concerned for Tomoyo at this moment and let it slip. To her surprise Tomoyo had not only passed out but was rapidly shrinking before her very eyes.

Eventually Tomoyo came round to find herself lying on something fluffy. Getting to her feet she first looked round and up to see her coffee table looming above her and then, turning the other way, she saw the gigantic vista that was Sakura Kinomoto. Tomoyo was overjoyed while Sakura felt terrible concern.

"TOMOYO-CHAN," Sakura thundered as she lowered her hand down to her level, "ARE YOU ALRIGHT?" Tomoyo smiled with a strong feeling of happiness and love and replied.

"Perfectly alright, Sakura-chan!" And she jumped into Sakura's palm. Sakura was surprised by how quickly and enthusiastically Tomoyo clambered into her hand when she considered how overwhelming everything must be from Tomoyo's point of view. Carefully lifting her tiny friend up to her eye level as she kneeled on the floor Sakura turned to Kero.

"What Clow card is this?" She asked.

"It must be the Little card." He replied.

"Little as in small?" Sakura checked although there was no need for Kero to answer. "So what do we do now?" This second question was serious.

"We can't just chase after it," Kero informed her, "If it touches you not only will you shrink but your magical powers will disappear." Sakura was disappointed by that answer as she not only wanted to return Tomoyo to her normal size but she wanted to stop the card from affecting anyone else. Just then Tomoyo makes a suggestion...
13322111.title: Tiny Tomoyo

13322112.content:
As Sakura retrieved her pompoms after becoming overenthusiastic during cheerleading practice she heard Tomoyo singing in choir practice for the upcoming contest. The melodious voice was so soothing and pacifying that Sakura couldn't help but pause to hear it. Just then she picked up on the presence of a Clow card and began to search for any clear sign of it.

While she searched a dot of light bounced from its hiding place and down the nearby corridor, straight to the music room. Suddenly Tomoyo's singing was cut-off and gasps of surprise replaced it before the teacher started calling Tomoyo's name, closely followed by a query of whether or not she felt well. Filled with concern Sakura dashed into the music room calling out Tomoyo's name. Upon seeing no sign of her while the music teacher knelt upon the floor and several other members of the Tomoeda Elementary choir gathered around her.

"Where's Tomoyo-chan?!?" Sakura asked the teacher. Looking up at her Tsujitani-sensei responded in the calm manner you get when you've seen something almost totally unbelievable.

"She's right here, Kinomoto-san." She held out her cupped hands, in which Sakura was almost stunned to see Tomoyo, shrunk down to the size of her thumb. Looking up at Sakura Tomoyo called out her name, which sounded rather far away to Sakura.

"Tomoyo-chan, you... shrunk?" Sakura checked as she did what she could to make sure she was seeing the real thing. The response only came as a nod.
13322112.title: Choir Crushed by Clow Card?

133221121.content:
Carefully Sakura and Tsujitani-sensei stood up, Tsujitani did so because she did not want Tomoyo to lose her footing in her hands and Sakura did so to try and keep her eyes level with Tomoyo.

"Daidouji-san," Tsujitani asked her, "What can we do for you?" It wasn't a question like that delivered by a waitress, it was more of a question that desperately wanted a suggestion as to how the situation could be remedied.

"I'm not too sure," Tomoyo called up to her, "But please don't worry so, sensei. I feel all right." Tsujitani relaxed slightly at Tomoyo's calm approach to her situation.

"Tomoyo-chan," Sakura inquired, "What will your mother say?!?" There was a pause that hung in the air as though Sakura was going to continue but couldn't find the right words.

"It'll be fine, Sakura-chan." Tomoyo answered her.

"Well you can't continue with rehearsals." Tsujitani informed her. "Shall we phone your mother?" Tomoyo shook her head slightly and answered.

"Phone home first, please, and ask if they can take me back to my bedroom. Then you can tell my mother." Sakura was taken aback by how calmly Tomoyo spoke when the situation was not only strange but also witnessed by several people. Tsujitani also looked concerned.

"Are you sure, Daidouji-san?" She asked. "Maybe Kinomoto-san could give you a lift?" Sakura confirmed this, feeling uplifted by being able to help and the chance to reduce the number of witnesses. Tomoyo now felt torn between the straightforward option of confronting her situation head-on and letting her bodyguards and the Daidouji household servants, not to mention her mother, see what had happened or spending time with Sakura, especially since she looked so huge now.
133221121.title: What Will They Do?

1332211212.content:
"I'm so grateful to you, Sakura-chan." Tomoyo called up to her. "I accept your generous offer to carry me back home." Tsujitani-sensei was relieved to hear this and held out the hand that Tomoyo was sitting in so that Sakura could take custody of her; Sakura, in turn, held one of her hands out for her little friend to step into. Once her transport was still Tomoyo got to her feet, her miniscule shoes sinking into her music teacher's palm mere millimetres, and walked across to the edge of her hand, ready to let Sakura literally take possession of her.

However, just as she reached the edge of Tsujitani's hand, the teacher tipped it and, thusly, caused Tomoyo to tumble into Sakura's hand. Picking herself up Tomoyo made a comic dusting-off as she knelt in Sakura's palm.

"Sorry, Daidouji-san," Tsujitani stated, "I didn't think you'd be able to safely step into Kinomoto-san's hand without some assistance."

"It's all right, Tsujitani-sensei," Tomoyo replied, "But you needn't have bothered. I would've been happy to just leap into Sakura-chan's hand." Her voice dropped so that no one could hear her. "It's so soft and warm and cosy." As Tomoyo continued to daydream Sakura excused herself and...
1332211212.title: Sakura Takes Tomoyo in Hand

13322112121.content:
Slowly and carefully Sakura wrapped her fingers around Tomoyo's shrunken form, making sure not to grip her too tight, before she excused herself from the music room and went out into the corridor.

"Tomoyo-chan," She whispered so that others wouldn't hear but also to ensure she wouldn't hurt Tomoyo's little ears, "Shall we go and see Mizuki-sensei? The thing is she hinted that something will happen." Tomoyo took quite a while to answer but not because she couldn't determine the best course of action, she was too engrossed in the position of power that Sakura had over her. She kept runing her hands over Sakura's fingers, lying back in her fist and dreaming over Sakura's soothing whispering.

"Yes." Tomoyo replied at last. "She seems to know rather more than she lets on." Sakura only heard the yes clearly, the rest was uncertain. Looking round Sakura now faced another problem.

"I don't want anyone else to see you." She commented. "It was a bit of luck with Tsujitani-sensei and the choir but..." Tomoyo knew what Sakura was getting at and, to be sure that she would be noticed, squeezed the inner side of Sakura's thumb with all her effort.

"Don't worry, Sakura-chan." She answered. "They can keep quiet, so can mother, my bodyguards and the maids." Sakura really admired Tomoyo's cool head in this situation. "It would be prudent, though," She continued, "To keep me out of sight until the right time."

Does Sakura have any pockets in her cheerleading uniform?
13322112121.title: Where will she be Carried?

133221121211.content:
"I have hip pockets," Sakura told her diminished friend, "But no front pockets."

"That's all right, Sakura-chan," Tomoyo answered, "As long as you keep me close I'll be fine." Satisfied Sakura carefully swung her hand down to her side and slipped it inside her pocket, whereupon she slowly relaxed her grip on Tomoyo, causing her to slip through her fingers and tumble down to the bottom of the pocket. "Thanks for that bit of fun, Sakura-chan." She quipped with a giggle as she watched the hand withdraw from the pocket. Her view of the outside world was a narrow corridor of which half was what was behind Sakura and the other half was of Sakura's back. 'Who knows,' She thought, 'Maybe the swinging of your hips will rock me to sleep.' With that she lay back with a clear view out of the pocket and calmly waited for Sakura to start walking.

At first Sakura did her best to minimalise the swinging of her hips for fear of making Tomoyo seasick or of bashing her against her leg but, as she progressed through the school, she became rather more conscious as to her obligations within its walls and began to accelerate. As she moved the skirt of her cheerleading uniform flapped with her, which made sure that Tomoyo knew Sakura was on the move. Fortunately the pocket she was in did not make contact with Sakura's leg but the swinging actually prevented Tomoyo from drifting off, instead making it seem more like a fairground ride.

"I'm riding the Sakura express!" She cried out, but no one could hear her as her voice was first absorbed by the fabric surrounding her and then drowned out by Sakura's footfalls.

Where does Sakura find Kaho?
133221121211.title: En Route to Kaho Mizuki

1332211212112.content: Does Sakura find her in the teacher's lounge?
1332211212112.title: Staff Lounge?

13322112121122.content: Will Kaho and Sakura meet in the corridor?
13322112121122.title: In the Corridor?

133221121211221.content:
"Mizuki-sensei!" Sakura called out upon seeing her. She, in turn, turned to greet her.

"Sakura-san," She acknowledged, "Is everything okay?" But both knew that the other was aware that it wasn't.

"Something's happened to Tomoyo-chan while she was rehearsing." Sakura mentioned.

"What sort of thing?" Kaho asked, whereupon Sakura steadily took Tomoyo out of her pocket.

Tomoyo could hear every word of the conversation, so she knew why Sakura's hand had returned to the pocket. She did her best to ensure that the fingers would wrap neatly around her but it was difficult as the fabric of Sakura's skirt acted like a bouncy castle for her so, when one of her feet ended up between two of Sakura's fingers, Tomoyo changed her tactic and just let her body relax while Sakura carefully slipped her fingers under her and closed her hand as she lifted her passenger out of her pocket.

"This sort of thing." Sakura answered as she held her hand up before Kaho's eyes and released her grip on Tomoyo, allowing her freedom of movement in her palm. Kaho is not really surprised as she looks upon Tomoyo's miniature form and she, in turn, greets her with a wave.

"This is a bit of a problem, isn't it?" Kaho commented. Sakura was none too impressed with this line but Tomoyo took it humorously, secure in the knowledge as to who would see her in this state and confident in those who were likely to hold her. What does Kaho do?
133221121211221.title: Presented to Kaho

1332212.content: Do you want an event that occurs during the canon series or one that takes place after the series?
1332212.title: Inset Story?

13322122.content:
"What does Tomoyo wish to tell me?" Sakura pondered during another bus journey to the Daidouji mansion; it had only been the afternoon before that Tomoyo asked Sakura to visit because she had something important to tell her. Of course Sakura was happy to spend time with her but she always felt concerned when Tomoyo spoke in a plain 'matter-of-fact' tone as she interpreted it as meaning that something serious and, possibly, disturbing had occurred.

Upon reaching the mansion Sakura wasn't too surprised when Tomoyo enthusiastically led her up to her room but there definitely was something that was bothering Tomoyo as her perkiness seemed to have slipped slightly. Everything seemed to rush by as Sakura found herself sitting on Tomoyo's sofa before she knew it; Tomoyo herself had seated in such a way as to be close to Sakura but with a slight distance so as to try and give Sakura more room to breathe.

"You said you had something to tell me." Sakura commented, noticing a sense of unease in the air.

"How long have we been friends, Sakura?" Tomoyo asked her in response.

"Three or four years, I suppose." Sakura answered, slightly confused by this response.

"How are you and Li getting on?" Tomoyo inquired.

"We've written to each other a few times." Sakura returned. "We do miss each other but you and Meilin have provided us with such support. Somehow I feel as though I can handle Syaoran's absence better now; we have surprising differences, he told me once that he likes an academic atmosphere and that he gets unnerved when someone expresses themselves to the full. I'm starting to feel some doubt in our love." Sakura choked back a few tears while Tomoyo let her go at her own pace. "I'm wondering if what I feel for Syaoran has similarities to how I felt about Yukito." Tomoyo smiled knowingly; she had seen that Sakura had become more self-perceptive over the past months. Sakura did not continue and her tears had dried up so now Tomoyo orated.

"Sakura, ever since our first meeting I felt a strong friendship for you but, by the start of the second trimester in our third year at school, I knew that it was more than just friendship. I expected that you would find happiness in someone else but, somehow, the gods have constantly placed obstacles in your pursuit of the ones you love while I could open up whenever I chose. I am sure that the time has come. Sakura... I... love... you." Sakura looked as though she might understand but clearly she was making herself see this statement in a platonic manner, so Tomoyo added. "I love you like Yukito loves Touya, like how Syaoran loved you or maybe still does. Sakura, you are the one I wish to devote my life to." Sakura's expression now showed something like being stunned; Tomoyo sat there to let Sakura absorb the information.

"Love?" Sakura asked and Tomoyo calmly nodded. "As in like with Chiharu and Yamazaki?" Tomoyo slightly nodded but also shrugged her shoulders, knowing how slapstick the mentioned relationship tended to get.
13322122.title: Tomoyo's Confession

133221221.content:
"Tomoyo," Sakura commented as she felt her body respond to the news, "I don't know what to say. My heart says that this is the best news I've had since Eriol told me that I had become the new Master of the Cards, or maybe even better, but my head says that it won't work since we could have no child."

"Sakura," Tomoyo responded to that last comment, "Isn't it also accepted that humans can't willfully change size or fly or make things appear and disappear?" Sakura looks straight at her for a moment and then says.

"I could... I could see to it that children can be in this relationship. Oh, Tomoyo," She leaps onto her and madly embraces her, "I'M SO HAPPY!" Tomoyo smiles and returns the hug before she too lets herself go wild with joy, both of them hugging one another with such vigour you couldn't separate them with the jaws-of-life.

"Sakura," Tomoyo whispered into her lover's ear, "Is it alright if I call mum? She longed for her issue and Nadeshiko's issue to come together, a sort of reforming of the bond they had." Sakura didn't batter an eyelid; Tomoyo's news made her feel complete, like there was nothing she couldn't do and nobody who could interfere with them.

"Go ahead, Tomoyo." She replied and with that their embrace broke while Tomoyo stepped aside to ring up her mother. Sakura then began to wonder. 'Is there anything special we can do together right here, in a few minutes?'
133221221.title: Joy to the Girls

133221222.content:
Tomoyo stood up in the darkness, having recovered from the transportation that brought her here. Once she got used to the lack of light she noticed that she was indeed on a soft surface and, looking round, she found a vast hill rising above her; she followed this with her eyes in both directions until she finally spotted what she was looking for. Off in the distance she could see that this mountain was really a gigantic girl, a charming giant girl, a giant girl so caring and so powerful that she would never leave Tomoyo’s mind; it was Sakura Kinomoto.

“I made it.” Tomoyo commented to herself, certain that her voice was now too faint for Sakura to hear, especially while in a deep sleep. Tomoyo took another look at the mighty ridge Sakura’s prone body made and then took a glance at her luminous watch; where she was going she’d need all the light she could get. She brought her video camera out of her handbag. “I know I’ve got a long journey ahead of me,” She commented to herself again, “But I just can’t resist the prospect of a hike on Sakura’s beautiful body.” She set her camera so the recording screen was pointing in the same direction as the lens, in order to film herself, and pressed record. “I, Tomoyo Daidouji,” She announced dramatically, “Have come here, into Sakura’s bedroom, to undertake an incredible adventure. Now that I am barely one centimetre tall I will venture forth into the unknown, see new sights, hear new sounds and smell new smells as I boldly go where no human has ever gone before.” Her tone changed from dramatic to jolly. “But first, let us look at the grand vista of Sakura Kinomoto as viewed from the perspective of an insect.” And with that she marched recklessly towards the titaness, struggling over the creases in the sheets caused by Sakura’s enormous sleeping form before she went on all fours to haul herself up Sakura’s side.

Having reached the top, in spite of Sakura’s occasional shift in her sleep, Tomoyo now looked down towards Sakura’s feet and then up towards Sakura’s head, all the while recording the vista with her video camera, commenting on both the blatant size difference but also on her perceptions of the mountain-sized Sakura; although she knew that she was the one who’s tiny Tomoyo couldn’t help but refer to Sakura as being the one who was huge, it was all a matter of perspective and Tomoyo had plenty of that. Tomoyo took a break from her recording and leaned down to listen in on Sakura’s stomach.

“I’ll be joining you later.” She whispered to it as she returned to her feet. “Sakura’s face is so beautiful.” She expressed as she kept her camera focused on the snoozing visage looming in the distance. “Let’s take a closer look.” Now, having no tiredness from her climb up Sakura, Tomoyo began her night-hike across from above Sakura’s stomach up towards Sakura’s head.

Once Tomoyo reached Sakura's collar bone the giantess shifted again in her sleep, turning over to her side and bringing one hand up to rest next to her head; the change in orientation inadvertently caused Tomoyo to tumble down towards Sakura's shoulder but, instead of landing on the pillow, Tomoyo found herself partially entangled in the pyjama collar. It took her a bit of time to free herself from the giant lip of clothing and dropping down onto the pillow; Sakura's body caused a depression here that nearly made Tomoyo slide down into a nook next to Sakura's neck. The temptation was strong to snuggle up against Sakura's larynx but Tomoyo reminded herself that she had come to get even more intimate than that.

Tomoyo hauled herself up the incline of the pillow, Sakura's snoozing an omnipresent sound that gave her a real thrill and also a calming effect as she kept thinking as to who was making the breathing sound, before finally coming to a point where it was relatively level so she didn't have to go on all fours. In spite of the grand vista that Sakura's face gave for her to record Tomoyo had to have her wits about her as she was edging along a ledge where the horizontal became the vertical around Sakura's head. For a moment Tomoyo sat on this ledge and kept her camera trained on Sakura's mouth directly ahead.

"That which is better than being next to the one you love," Tomoyo continued her commentary, "Is being inside the one you love." She slid down the slope until she was within arm's reach of Sakura's lips, which hung open as the magical giantess slept; every single breath inadvertently washed over her tiny visitor but Tomoyo wasn't fazed, as far as she was concerned Sakura's breath was the sweetest breeze ever to exist. From the shrunken girl's point of view the inhalation was a cool coaxing breeze that seemed to be trying to get Tomoyo to hurry along and the exhalation was a warm reassuring invitation to venture into a system of caverns that would actually be much warmer than outside. Not wanting to
keep her girlfriend waiting Tomoyo took hold of the lowest join between Sakura's lips and pulled herself up onto it; she kept the rise of her shoes on the lip and steadied herself against Sakura's upper lip as she scanned the inside with the camera, which had been recording with an in built torch on. Tomoyo had it on low so, even if the light struck Sakura's eyelid, the giantess would not wake; now Tomoyo set it to standard illumination as there was no way that Sakura would notice the light inside her. Tomoyo took a deep breath, revelling in the scent of Sakura's maw, and made one last comment before advancing.

"Here I go, deep into Sakura-chan."
133221222.title: A Dream Come True

choices: Tomoyo reaches the back of her mouth.
1332212221.content:
Tomoyo stepped off Sakura's lips and into the awaiting mouth; at first she attempted to walk upon the tongue but its constant heaving, coupled with the cave being at right angles to her, caused her to stumble. Once she steadied herself she realised that she had been using one of Sakura's premolars to right herself.

"Amazing!" She declared. Taking the initiative Tomoyo once again pulled herself up, this time onto the inside of Sakura's teeth, and made herself comfortable as she filmed her giant surroundings. "Sakura-chan," She announced in spite of the knowledge that her host couldn't hear her, "You have the most beautiful mouth in the universe." She watched as the tongue shifted up and down, forwards and backwards, at one point very nearly making Tomoyo get ahead of herself. As she considered this Tomoyo lay back with her feet in the nook of one of Sakura's molars, her body resting on the gum and her head using the soft palette as a pillow. She started daydreaming; imagining Sakura doing this deliberately.

"Tomoyo-chan," Sakura muffled as she swirled her friend around her mouth, "You are so delicious."

"Tomoyo-chan," She murbled without bringing her teeth together, "Please be careful there."

"Oh, Sakura-chan." Tomoyo sighed at the thought of Sakura being willing to eat her. When Sakura took a huff it aroused her from this dreamland; looking round she saw the slightly wider opening between the giant's lips steadily closing to a gap she'd have to crawl through if she wanted to get out. Tomoyo smiled; she wasn't going to go back even now. She had made her decision and she had one hundred percent confidence in her assistant's capability to protect her from the dangerous side of going along Sakura's alimentary canal.

She shifted her position, now lying on her stomach on one tooth, and proceeded to film the underside of Sakura's tongue, followed by the hard palette beyond the great muscle and even took the time to focus her camera on every one of Sakura's teeth. As she was filming the eighth lower right tooth Sakura's incisors came together, bringing the upper set within, from Tomoyo's point of view, ten feet of the lower set and a strange groan accompanied by an unusual manoeuvre undertaken by the tongue indicated that she was swallowing an accumulation of saliva.

"It looks like I may have overstayed my welcome." Tomoyo commented for the recording. "I'd better wrap up and venture deeper into the magnificent body of Sakura Kinomoto." She got to her feet, using Sakura's teeth as stepping stones, and walked towards the back of the mouth. Sixth tooth, seventh tooth, eighth tooth...
1332212221.title: Enter the Cardcaptor's Cavern

13322122212.content:
Tomoyo jumped off the last tooth and fell splat onto Sakura's tongue; she was amused by the way it shifted against her, coating her in a layer of saliva that outmatched the light drizzle she had been experiencing while she was nearer the front of the orifice. She once again went into a flight of fancy, imagining Sakura swirling her around in her mouth again, tasting every last millimetre of her and enjoying every moment. When she fell over again Tomoyo snapped back to reality.

She was now lying against the frontier of Sakura's gums with the tongue having given up on her; a loud huff roared around her and a major gust buffeted her so that she might've been blown close to the front of the tongue had she not been obstructed by the gums. Tomoyo looked to where the roaring huff was strongest; there it was, a dull pink followed by pitch black, the beginning of Sakura's throat. Yawning wide it seemed to await a tasty snack, enticing Tomoyo to go further but she did not want to miss out on a single piece of detail within Sakura’s mouth. Scanning the mighty orifice with her camera Tomoyo found herself taking particular interest in the uvula.

“Wow!” She exclaimed upon the sight of it hanging from the roof of Sakura’s mouth, steadily waving with every breath the giantess took. Tomoyo calmly walked deeper into Sakura’s body pausing right underneath the great fleshy stalactite. “It’s so amusing.” Tomoyo noted as she pointed her camera right up to it; a couple of times it looked like it would knock the video camera out of her tiny hand and down into Sakura’s pharynx. Understanding this Tomoyo began to reach for it, desiring to pat it and tickle it; just as she was about to stand on tiptoe to make contact with it she changed her mind. “I cannot give Sakura-chan’s uvula a tickle,” She thought aloud, “It might rouse her and I can just imagine what she’ll say.”

Holding a soaking Tomoyo in between her thumb and forefinger Sakura refused every attempt Tomoyo made to put her back in her mouth. “Tomoyo-chan,” She said, “I could never eat you. Why did you go in there anyway?”

“She wouldn’t figure my actions.” Tomoyo continued, partly to herself and partly as commentary for the video. “Not until she sees that I can pass through her without being digested.” With that she looked at the way the slope of Sakura’s pharynx was orientated as she attempted to gauge how to walk down the gullet, sitting right on the edge of Sakura’s tongue, her feet hanging over the ‘event horizon’.
13322122212.title: A Ready and Willing Meal

133221222121.content:
Tomoyo slid down the back of Sakura’s tongue, landing on one of the walls in the pharynx. She smiled amusingly as she associated it with a funfair slide with a crash mat at the base for Sakura’s flesh was as comfy as the cushions of her sofa but as firm as laminate flooring. She picked herself up and scanned the area with her camera, the in-built light being the primary means by which she could see her surroundings, taking note of the soft pink walls of the one part of the human body unseen by a dentist or anyone except for those who used endoscopes and she was sure Sakura never had one of those in her. Tomoyo was very confident that she was the first person ever to see Sakura’s pharynx from the inside.

“Marvellous!” Tomoyo declared as she brought her scan to an end by pointing her camera at the very end of Sakura’s tongue, where it merged with the rest of her body. Observing the soft pink surroundings and feeling even the slightest of breaths Tomoyo began to advance deeper into Sakura’s body.

As the light increased outside Sakura responded only by moving one of her arms but this change in orientation registered to Tomoyo as a clear Sakura-quake, forcing her to steady herself by leaning on the back wall of Sakura’s pharynx; she was so deep inside Sakura now that any change in the amount of light outside would go unnoticed.

Upon reaching the divide in the throat where the oesophagus and trachea begin Tomoyo found that she had to do all she could to resist Sakura’s inhalations, which were now very powerful, as they appeared to be trying to drag her into the larynx where she would surely be choked on. In spite of knowing that her voice would be too feeble Tomoyo couldn’t help but call out.

“Sakura-chan! Don’t breathe me in or you’ll be coughing until the cows come home!” Fortunately one of the exhalations provided enough force for Tomoyo to bounce of the back of the throat and land next to the epiglottis. Dusting herself off Tomoyo looked at this firm flap of skin and thought over its role, smiling at the realisation that it also provided shelter from Sakura’s hurricane breath. Though it was no longer buffeting her she could hear the great whooshing roars of her beloved’s breathing.

Looking straight down Sakura’s gullet Tomoyo noticed that where there was a ring of folds when she first shone a light down there now it was a smooth almost uniform tunnel leading even deeper into Sakura’s body, which was starting to feel like a sauna at this depth.

As she strolled down Sakura’s gullet Tomoyo now noticed another strange sound; accompanying the distant windy sounds of the giantess’s breathing there was now a steady rhythmic percussion sound emanating from one of the walls somewhere ahead. As she ventured deeper Tomoyo recognised this the sound of Sakura’s heart, which was now as big as a house as far as she was concerned.

“Oh, Sakura-chan,” Tomoyo commented, “I always knew you had a big heart.” She continued her walk unabated by any variation in the air as she left the throat behind her, penetrating the darkest and warmest depths of Sakura’s body, never once turning her camera off.
133221222121.title: Into the Abyss

1332212221212.content:
Tomoyo walked deeper and deeper into Sakura, her video camera capturing every last detail of the oesophagus, while drinking in the sounds of Sakura's heartbeat and the now-distant breathing. By now the temperature had reached approximately 37 degrees Celsius with Tomoyo being so far inside Sakura, however her skin was now registering it as 30 degrees, partly due to the time elapsed between being at Sakura's lips and about halfway down her gullet but mostly due to the same anti-digestion magic doing its best to keep Tomoyo at a fairly comfortable temperature. Because of this Tomoyo now found herself sweating in this hot humid tunnel.

"I always knew you were so warm, Sakura-chan." Tomoyo commented for a bit of humour.

Before too long Tomoyo saw a wall of flesh up ahead; curious she approached with her hand stretched out to feel for any evidence of the entrance to Sakura's stomach. Upon making contact with the smooth muscle Tomoyo felt a strange change in the distance above her head to the side of the oesophagus. Looking up she noticed that she hadn't quite reached the end of the gullet, a set of folds led to a narrow passage right above her. By Tomoyo's standards she would have to try and climb the inside of Sakura's gullet for ten feet or so before being able to start on making the oesophageal sphincter accept her into Sakura's tummy.

Tomoyo tried to climb the smooth muscle of the oesophagus with one hand while still filming her surroundings. She struggled to get her feet into the few folds that were available and tried to climb with both hands while still holding the camera. She made some way but, just as she came within arm's reach of the sphincter, she slipped and fell. Fortunately the flesh was at just the right consistency to prevent her from getting any injury except for the possibility of a minor bruise.

"I would've thought your body would want a light snack, Sakura-chan." Tomoyo joked, in spite of her knowledge that Sakura would hardly notice her if at all. Sighing she shouldered the camera and hauled herself back up with all four limbs, climbing all the way up to the sphincter. Reaching out with the hand she hadn't been wielding the camera with she squeezed four fingers through into Sakura's stomach and wriggled them in the hopes of stimulating its automatic response to something descending through the gullet. It only gave some so her hand could fit through when it closed round her wrist.

With great determination Tomoyo gripped the lining of Sakura's stomach and pulled, struggling to get the sphincter open and enter the stomach. She gradually hauled her arm through and, when her elbow got through, she used it to provide leverage as she pulled and pushed as hard as she could. Eventually her shoulder was at the entrance and she managed to pry open the sphincter enough to get her head and shoulders through. Before long, though, the sphincter closed around her waist. Noticing that it wasn't letting her slide back any more than it was letting her pull forward she continued her recording for now and gasped in awe as the light on her camera illuminated the interior of Sakura's stomach.

"Magnificent." She declared as she psyched herself up to get the rest of her body in.
1332212221212.title: Struggling with a Sphincter

13322122212121.content:
With one great push on the lining of Sakura's stomach Tomoyo got her hips and legs through and landed with a plop as the stomach wall cushioned her fall. The sphincter had closed again, this time around her ankles. She knew she needed to do this carefully or her shoes would slip off and she was reluctant to leave anything behind. This time she changed her technique; bending over and using her hands to, once again, pull the sphincter open and bring her feet into Sakura's stomach. She struggled against Sakura's smooth muscles but finally had a wide enough opening to swing her feet up and out of the oesophagus. Sighing with relief she retrieved her camera to get every detail of her new surroundings.

"Sakura-chan is truly marvellous to behold," She commented, "Even the folds of her stomach are so well-patterned. It could be part of a new wallpaper or carpet catelogue." She joked. Just then her world turned upside down and she tumbled an apparent distance of forty yards before coming to a stop "Kya!" She exclaimed in surprise and alarm. She thanked her 'current location' for being cushioned so that she didn't even seem to acquire any bruising.

"Aiieee! I'm late!" Sakura cried out as she rose with the alarm, upon observing the time.

"Pardon?" Kero groaned as Sakura's cry roused him. Sakura threw aside the covers, returned the alarm clock to its place on the shelf and rushed for her school uniform.

Deep inside her Tomoyo got tumbled around as Sakura dashed this way and that getting her things together. One advantage of her location was that she could hear everything Sakura said.

"Goodness." She struggled to say as she was tossed about by Sakura's movements. "How can she be late if she set the alarm?" It was tough for her to figure this out as she was jiggled so. During a period of rest she tried to understand why Sakura had made such an error but was interrupted by a groaning from above. Within seconds a volume of water large enough for Tomoyo to fill a sink with fell from the ceiling. She moved out of the way as quick as she could but still got one foot sodden by this. Having found a fold that she could use as a seat she looked at the liquid Sakura had swallowed, wondering if there was food coming down already, when she noticed the froth floating in it. "Nice one, Sakura-chan." She blurted out as she understood it was leftover from Sakura brushing her teeth. Before she could continue the tossing and tumbling began again.
13322122212121.title: The Mountain Awakes

choices: Nope, someone else is in here!
133221222121211.content:
The rapid motion suddenly stopped as Sakura came to a halt. "OH!" Tomoyo heard Sakura exclaim, "I forgot!" There were a couple of thuds as Sakura patted her stomach. "Well its a bit late now, I'll have to wait until after school to get you out."

This confused Tomoyo greatly. She wondered if Sakura has known all along that Tomoyo had been sneaking around inside her body. This could mean a number of things.
133221222121211.title: Sakura feels Tomoyo.

1332212221212112.content: As Tomoyo was pondering how Sakura knew she had snuck in, she heard a groan from nearby. It wasn't a stomach growl either, but a real human voice! She quickly directed her light over in the general direction and gasped. What her light illuminated was a human body! And a live one too, judging from the person's hand moving to shield their eyes. Tomoyo went over to see who it was and found…
1332212221212112.title: Nope, someone else is in here!

13322122212121121.content:
"Toya!" Tomoyo said aloud.

Toya looked up at Tomoyo in surprise. "I wasn't expecting to see anyone else in here, especially not you. What'd you do?"

Tomoyo blinked. "Do?" She wondered then if Sakura had put Toya in here as a punishment. Maybe all the times he called her a monster had finally gotten to her. But why would Sakura reveal her powers out of annoyance? It didn't seem like her.

"Nevermind, you don't have to say." Toya said then. "But will you hear me out? Maybe it can help my case to hear a third party's point of view on it."

"Sure, I'm all ears," Tomoyo replied, still rather confused.
13322122212121121.title: Toya in the tummy!

133221222121211211.content:
"Well," Toya began, "I've known of Sakura's powers for a while. I know you have too. But I always kept my knowledge a secret, thinking maybe I could help from the sidelines without Sakura knowing. Recently, though, I've been feeling guilt that I've kept this from her for so long. So, I decided to tell her. I thought maybe she would be annoyed, so I decided to do something nice for her first. I made us a big dinner with her favorite foods. Then over dessert, I broke the news." Toya grimaced. "She didn't take it well. She also assumed the dinner I made was a bribe of sorts to get on her good side so she wouldn't be angry. I think that's what made her decide to punish me this way. I suppose it's fitting now that I think about it. I just wish she had told me that she made it so I would be safe in here! I know she wouldn't hurt me on purpose, but I was worried her anger had gotten to her…" Toya shuddered.

Tomoyo had listened to his explanation without saying a word, but this last line made her pipe up in Sakura's defense. "Hey, Sakura wouldn't kill anyone! Especially not you! Come on!"

Toya sighed. "Yes, I know. Its just she gave me quite a scare doing that. How about you? Did she tell you you would be safe in here?"

Tomoyo hesitated. "Um. I. I actually kinda… snuck in while she was asleep."

Toya was flabbergasted. "What?! Why?! How did you know you'd be safe?! And how did you even get small enough in the first place?"


((Writer's note: I think it would be best if people let the original author of this storyline do Tomoyo's explanation. I know I'm interested in what he had in mind!))

*Note from the Author: I don't mind others coming up with an explanation along this route because this departs from my original concept already.*
133221222121211211.title: Toya explains

choices: Sakura finishes her breakfast and leaves the house.
Tomoyo helps herself to some of Sakura's breakfast.
133221222121212.content:
Though the 'bouncy castle' effect of the stomach lining left Tomoyo with temporary disorientation she could clearly her the mighty thuds of Sakura's slipper-clad feet upon the stairs. Once the shaking stopped Tomoyo heard her host declare.

"Morning!" There was a brief moment of relatively light shaking that still allowed Tomoyo to move of to the side, knowing what would be coming down. "I'm sorry." Tomoyo paused for a moment, wondering how it was whoever Sakura was talking to she couldn't hear them; surely the walls of the stomach wouldn't be enough.

Before long Tomoyo could hear Sakura gulping in rapid succession and grains of rice as big as she was came tumbling down into the great cavern. In just a minute the floor was hidden beneath a pile of rice and the walls became very moist, as though it was sweating. Tomoyo sighed as she continued to film everything.

"Poor Sakura." She remarked in view of the fact the giantess was bolting her breakfast. The gastric fluids were of no real concern to the shrunken girl as she had been thoroughly assured that it would behave like ordinary water to her.
133221222121212.title: Rushed Rice

choices: Sakura makes it to the classroom on time.
1332212221212121.content:
Tomoyo managed to find a relatively small crevice to lodge herself while Sakura rapidly got herself sorted out for school. The ride was still rough but not as bad as it was before; at one point Tomoyo was concerned that she'd tumble over to the other side as Sakura leaned over.

"I'm leaving now!" Sakura called out before a stunning ride occurred. Curiously enough rice grains were still coming in as the giantess roller-bladed off to school.

"Would've been better if she got up earlier." Tomoyo remarked. The secretions of the stomach wall hadn't increased since the first mouthful, which suggested the possibility of indigestion. Tomoyo hung on as Sakura braked, doing her best to stop the inertia from throwing her smack into the giant rice grains.
1332212221212121.title: Dash to School

133222.content: How about Meilin Li being shrunk?
133222.title: Mini Meilin?

1332221.title: Alternative Storyline?

13322212.title: Inset Story?

133222122.content:
Meilin came round feeling slight vibrations reaching her through the environment; she could not see anything and felt like she was stuck inside some sort of a bog as she was surrounded by some viscous liquid, as she followed the sensation of stickiness through her body she figured that she was up to her chest in it. The vibrations were a clear mystery but her initial thought was that either she had to find help or she'd drown/suffocate in this strange bog.

"HELP! HELP!" She cried out but there was no response. She cried out again but one particularly strong surge of movement seemed to throw everything off-balance, causing her to get a mouthful of the substance and finishing up with it up to her shoulders. She's astonished to find that this stuff didn't taste like mud but like sweet strawberries. "Where am I?!?" She cried out in disbelief.

---

"Hey, Sakura-chan." Tomoyo addressed her friend.

"Yes, Tomoyo-chan?" Sakura queried in response.

"Shall we have lunch together?" Tomoyo asked, glancing at Sakura's bento in the side pocket of her backpack.

"S...Sure." Sakura replied. "I made my own lunch today; I wanted something special in my lunch." Tomoyo was intrigued but let it slide. 'Don't worry, Meilin-chan,' She thought, 'You'll be all right.'

---

Meilin called out for help several times but she finally decided that she wasn't getting anywhere; she was puzzled by the fact that she had not yet sank deeper into the strawberry-flavoured quagmire when she had gone what she thought of as four inches deeper in a few minutes. She quickly decided that she would be receiving no help soon and simply did what she could to be comfortable in this environment.

Every now and then surges and vibrations would reverberate around the swamp as she saw it before every thing returned to normal. Sometimes Meilin found herself sinking deeper into the goo but no deeper than having it up to her neck and sometimes she even felt herself rising out of it, but no higher than her stomach. Now and again she would cry out for help but to no avail.

Eventually, after one spectacular surge left her right back where she started, light began to arrive in spite of how dim it was. Looking round Meilin found that she was right in the middle of a large pale quagmire with dark walls rising up all sides and, somehow, it was covered over with a semi-translucent roof. After a while shadows danced beyond the ceiling and the walls got darker before she felt a different kind of surge, like that of being in a lift but with more power behind it.

---

"What do you have that's so special, Sakura-chan?" Tomoyo asked, unable to contain her curiosity anymore. Sweat-dropping for a moment Sakura decided to spill the beans.

"It's this, Tomoyo-chan." She replied, holding up a small yoghurt pot. Tomoyo looked at the label and identified it a strawberry yoghurt.

"Sounds delicious, Sakura-chan." Tomoyo commented. "But is it really all that special?"

"Yes." Sakura replied. "However, considering the extra ingredient, some people might call me kaijuu with every conviction." In spite of her muttering the sentence Tomoyo heard every word and just had to press the question; swallowing hard Sakura began to explain her intentions... to swallow Meilin!
133222122.title: A Ride in a Lunchbox

1332221221.content:
After a descent sensation, further shadows dancing over her and occasionally hearing voices outside, Meilin felt herself and her environment rising again. Feeling frustrated with all this turbulence Meilin was about to shout her feelings to the world when, suddenly, a loud noise accompanied a sudden influx of light as the roof was removed with unbelievable speed. It took her a few minutes to adjust to the light before she looked upwards to see a mind-boggling but also terrifying sight. High in the sky above, filling her entire field of view, was Sakura's face, bigger than she had ever known. For a moment Sakura left her field of vision, allowing Meilin to do a double-take. Tasting the quagmire again and looking at its colour she soon realised that she had been shrunk really, really small and was now inside a yoghurt pot. Her face turned blue with fear as she began to think of how and why all these events occurred. It wasn't long before Sakura appeared above the rim again and Meilin felt that her worst fears were confirmed as she saw that Sakura was now brandishing a spoon. As the enormous scoop descended Meilin cringed at the prospect of ending her life as no more that a tiny morsel of food for Sakura.

Sakura, however, had decided to start off with just the yoghurt and carefully navigated the spoon to avoid the tiny speck of a girl that Meilin was now. Lifting it up with care she let Tomoyo look upon the spoonful.

"I can't see her, Sakura-chan." She commented.

"No," Sakura replied, "She's not in this one." Having already mentioned humility when she started her lunch Sakura opened up her mouth without a sound and engulfed the spoonful of yoghurt.

Meilin quivered with fright; not only did she see an amount of yoghurt several times her own body weight disappear into Sakura's mouth in one indulgent slurp but both Sakura and Tomoyo were as audible as major thunderstorms; Meilin knew that she was intended to be eaten. She began to sob with overwhelming terror.

"Why?" She asked quietly as the spoon came back, but once again missed her and only got some yoghurt. Upon finding and hearing that she wasn't yet heading for Sakura's belly Meilin started to get frustrated as the shock wore off. "Enough with the teasing, Kinomoto." She commented at her regular voice level. "If you're gonna eat me then get it over with." A minute later she wished she hadn't said that as, this time, Sakura brought the spoon into the yoghurt and up underneath her. Meilin became temporarily petrified with terror as she was effortlessly lifted out of the pot with plenty of yoghurt. Once her ascent ended she looked around; Sakura was holding her at chest level as she found her potential executioner looking down at her with a simple smile on her face and, looking round again, found Tomoyo peering down at her at a much closer proximity.

"I CAN SEE HER, SAKURA-CHAN." She roared with a hint of amusement, almost deafening Meilin from such close proximity. "SHE LOOKS SO CUTE I CAN IMAGINE WHY YOU'D LIKE TO EAT HER." Once Tomoyo's massive visage withdrew Sakura lifted Meilin up until she was able to see all of Sakura's face, from her eyebrows to her lower lip, genuinely looking rather hungry. Meilin quivered with fright at the prospect of vanishing between those gigantic lips. Sakura made a yummy sound as loud as a thunderclap to Meilin and lifted her up even closer to one of her eyes.

"MEILIN-CHAN, YOU LOOK DELICIOUS." She thundered at a more bearable volume than Tomoyo did.

"WHY, KINOMOTO?!?" Meilin shouted at the titaness. "WHY?!?" The huge emerald orb disappeared momentarily as Sakura blinked, the movements of her muscles making enough sound for Meilin to notice every little movement in and around Sakura's eye even when she was not looking.
1332221221.title: Morsel Meilin

13322212211.content:
Sakura pulled her spoonful of yoghurt and Meilin away from her eye back to a position where Meilin could see everything from the eyebrows to the lips on her face and quietly explained her motivation for cannibalising her.

"EVER SINCE I CAPTURED THE BIG CARD," Sakura explained, "I ALWAYS HAD THIS DESIRE TO SHRINK AND EAT PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY PEOPLE I KNEW. I WAS HORRIFIED BY THE PROSPECT AT FIRST BUT, AS TIME WENT ON, I WONDERED WHAT IT WOULD BE LIKE TO HAVE SOMEONE WALK ON MY TONGUE, HOW THEY'D TASTE AND IF I WOULD BE ABLE TO FEEL THEM MOVING AROUND AFTER I SWALLOWED THEM. IT OCCURRED TO ME A FEW MONTHS AGO THAT, IF THEY WERE SOMEHOW PROTECTED FROM THE DANGERS OF BEING SWALLOWED I COULD EAT SOMEONE WITHOUT HAVING TO KILL THEM. I PRACTISED A LITTLE ON SMALL FISH, SEEING IF I COULD KEEP THEM ALIVE WITHIN ME, BEFORE I FINALLY FIGURED OUT A CHARM TO LET LIVING THINGS PLAY AROUND INSIDE OF ME." Having finished her story Sakura used the pinky on her free hand to scrape some yoghurt of the sides of the spoon before it dripped down her skirt, giving Meilin another scary but, this time, rather exciting experience as she watched Sakura lick enough yoghurt off her little finger to, from Meilin's point of view, fill a lorry. Meilin found herself being brought towards Sakura again, only to find herself closer to Sakura's ear than before.

"But, why me?" Meilin shouted. "You could've chosen anybody for this venture." Bringing her back round again Sakura lited her free index finger over Meilin, really amplifying the size difference when Meilin felt like she was going to be squished inside a large waste disposal unit, until she suddenly felt a strange feeling creep over her. When Sakura withdrew her forefinger Meilin looked towards Sakura in confusion. Although Sakura was too far away to see Meilin's reaction she knew that she wouldn't have a clue about what happened.

"THAT WAS THE PROTECTION CHARM." She explained, lifting Meilin back to her eye. "I DID THINK OF ASKING TOMOYO-CHAN TO TAKE THE JOURNEY BUT I WASN'T SURE IF SHE COULD MANAGE ALL THE MOVEMENTS MY BODY MAKES." Meilin looked even more confused, which didn't go unnoticed by Sakura's giant eye. "I FELT THAT IT REQUIRED SOMEONE ADVENTUROUS AND WITH PLENTY OF STAMINA." Meilin's pride rose to the surface now and mitigated the fear.

"Well," Meilin commented, "If you're sure I'll survive." Since she was speaking at normal volume Sakura had to strain to hear her prey. Once they were both sure that Meilin's words had gotten across Sakura brought her back for the final look at her massive visage before she commenced to eat this spoonful of yoghurt. In Japan the phrase 'Itadakimasu', which is said before eating, translates literally as 'I will humbly receive this' from the Shinto belief in animism. Sakura now used a derivative of this that meant.

"I WILL HUMBLY RECEIVE YOU." As she opened her mouth to devour Meilin while Tomoyo watched on with excitement and amusement.
13322212211.title: Heigh Ho, Into Sakura She Goes!

133222122111.content:
Meilin felt terribly tense and, for a moment, deafened after Sakura's declaration roared over her. She watched helplessly as Sakura's enormous mouth loomed closer and closer, every detail could be made out. Meilin looked on to see that, by comparison, Sakura's tongue could cover the whole of Tomoeda; her teeth, as they came into view, were the size of office blocks and, most ominously, the dark edifice at the back could swallow a skyscraper. Glancing back along the handle Meilin really could see just how small she was as Sakura's hand, clutching the spoon, was big enough for people Meilin's size to build a mountain village on, her fingernails alone had enough room on them for a one-man dwelling each. Turning back to the mouth Meilin was overwhelmed; she could see nothing but the inside of Sakura's mouth, the end of the spoon already passing between her front teeth. Meilin could even see Sakura's uvula hanging above the 'event horizon' as Meilin saw it; this was because once whatever Sakura put in her mouth went past it there was no chance of returning. All of a sudden worst-case scenario thoughts filled Meilin's mind.

'What if her protection magic doesn't work?' She thought. 'What if her stomach, sensing my presence as being that of food, digests me?!? What if I just end up as a nutrient soup?' Meilin did not cry out because she knew that she was too far from Sakura's ears to be heard even if she shouted as loud as she could. She braced herself for ingestion.

Sakura closed her mouth around the spoon, maintaining a steady pace to make Meilin's trip to seem less like that of a crumb and more like that of a pioneer. Glancing at Tomoyo she was most surprised to find her recording the whole event with her camera.

Meilin didn't look back as Sakura closed her mouth, she knew what was happening from the reduction in the amount of light present in the cave of flesh and enamel. Every sound Sakura made she could hear; even Sakura's slight muffled 'Hoe' was like a rumble of thunder to the tiny girl before a sound like someone emptying a swimming pool was accompanied by the spoon being withdrawn right from under her feet, leaving her lying in a pool of yoghurt and saliva upon Sakura's enormous pink tongue.
133222122111.title: In Sakura's Mouth

choices: Sakura swallows Meilin and the yoghurt
Sakura pins Meilin to the roof of her mouth and swallows the yoghurt
1332221221112.content:
It wasn't long before Meilin felt Sakura's tongue shift beneath her; at first Sakura was gentle, so that Meilin could get used to being moved about within her maw, but before long, the smooth sweet flavour of the yoghurt accompanied by the slightest tickle as Meilin found that her feet were now in contact with Sakura's taste buds, both of these factors made Sakura drift into pleasure from her food and now, as the yoghurt continued to slowly flow forth to completely coat her tongue, she couldn't help but swill it around her mouth. Meilin was stunned and, once again, terrified; she knew that Sakura was enjoying her lunch and she deduced that, since she was headed for Sakura's tummy, she was Sakura's lunch. As she was tossed around Meilin found that she made contact with all sorts of different things, ranging from the sticky goo of the strawberry yoghurt to the surprisingly comfortable softness, and yet, firmness of Sakura's tongue. As one quick swish of Sakura's tongue made her temporarily airborne in this humid environment Meilin continually focused on Sakura's loud, god-like reassurance until she landed in the yoghurt again, except that she felt her feet against something very hard. Meilin suddenly got that terrible worst-case scenario foreboding; her feet were in contact with one of Sakura's teeth and she felt sure that digestion-proof magic could not protect her from the grinding and crunching power of the teeth.

Sakura was most intrigued by Meilin's taste; although the strawberry flavour of the yoghurt dominated her buds Sakura could still pick up Meilin's flavour whenever she was in contact with her tongue, even when all the yoghurt surrounded her. Sakura immediately made a mental note of the curious taste of her Chinese friend.

Back in Sakura's mouth, Meilin was now surprised by what her eyes were seeing; although it was still dark she found that, somehow, enough light was available for her to make out the outlines of Sakura's flesh and the dull hint of white from Sakura's teeth. Another thing that surprised Meilin was how her feelings had changed while she was being swilled around and mixed in with yoghurt and saliva; initially terrified and marginally composed by Sakura's reassurance now she actually felt... comfortable in this situation. Meilin couldn't comprehend it, she actually felt as though she'd like being the smallest part of Sakura's lunch; in an effort to make sure she wasn't going crazy she told herself it couldn't be and laughed out loud. Since she wasn't much good at convincing others that her true feelings weren't so, such as when she was insecure about her relationship with Syaoran, her efforts did not convince her that it was all nonsense, her positive feelings about being a tasty treat for Sakura; there was one consolation, by speaking out loud she noticed that being inside Sakura's mouth was a lot like being in a cave for her voice managed to echo off Sakura's titanic white teeth and the extra firm roof of the mouth.

Meilin realised that the aerobatics that Sakura had put her through meant that she had been sitting down, up to her waist in the yoghurt-saliva mix, meaning that most of the yoghurt was elsewhere in this cavern of a mouth; Meilin didn't dwell on this since it would be obvious when Sakura would swallow and, even if she did get swamped in a globule that Sakura's tongue had formed, Meilin knew that she would be heading for the throat anyway. Instead she noticed that Sakura wasn't savouring either herself or her fellow foodstuff (i.e. the yoghurt) with the intensity that she had done but was now just raising and lowering her tongue, reminding Meilin of a boat trip she once took to Hainan. Shaking her head Meilin once again thought out loud, telling herself to focus on her situation. She now found that she could actually distinguish the various forms of flesh around Sakura's mouth, the light level being closer to twilight levels according to Meilin's eyes. She took notes that the yoghurt contrasted strongly with Sakura's tongue, having a much brighter shade of pink than the heaving muscle.

"Hey, Kinomoto," Meilin commented as her mind now found a humorous side to her predicament, "Is it just me or are you taking longer with this mouthful?" Meilin couldn't figure whether or not her minuscule voice reached through Sakura's own flesh and bone to her middle ear but, just as she had finished, Sakura's tongue became particularly active again.
1332221221112.title: Meilin's First Stop: Sakura's Mouth

13322212211121.content:
Meilin fell over as Sakura's tongue tilted up at the front, ready for the imminent swallow, leaving Meilin lying prone on her chest. She looked on towards the waiting orifice led would double as her entrance to Sakura's gullet and, before she knew it, she was almost totally swamped by the entire mass of yoghurt ready for the journey down Sakura's throat. Before long a deep drawn out groan accompanied by all the contents of Sakura's mouth steadily sliding to the back indicated to Meilin that Sakura was swallowing. Bracing herself she prepared to face the sheer drop down Sakura's esophagus.

As soon as the yoghurt that held her in place hung just below Sakura's uvula Meilin now found herself being drawn down into the pharynx at a slower rate than she had anticipated but, every pulsating muscle in this massive fleshy cavern seemed to be greeting her as the guest of honour in Sakura's lunch. The drama of it all now made Meilin excited, to her own surprise, and she also had a positive feeling of privilege as being the first person to venture inside a schoolgirl alive, ignoring the fact that it is Sakura Kinomoto. As Sakura's epiglottis forced her slimy strawberry-flavoured, partially digested transport into a highly anticipating gullet Meilin actually giggled as she considered the possibility of there being, in history, schoolgirls in tribes that practiced cannibalism; she shook it off as being ridiculous although she didn't discount the historical possibility of pre-adolescents in tribes who practiced cannibalism, either out of desperation or out of ritualistic customs. A sudden soft but firm pressure on her face brought her back to the situation at hand.

Meilin now realised that she wasn't just dropping down Sakura's throat like falling down a mains water pipe but that Sakura was unconsciously working at it. The walls of Sakura's gullet were squeezing Meilin and the yoghurt she was accompanying down towards her waiting stomach, making absolutely sure that they would take up residence there. As she was squeezed down Meilin found that her senses were reaching overload; her nose was almost overwhelmed by the smell of the yoghurt and her tongue was remembering the taste of droplets that had entered her own mouth while her body felt like Sakura's gullet was giving it a massage and her ears could hear Sakura's heartbeat and breathing through the masses of flesh that surrounded her, indicating that she who she was occupying was totally calm.
13322212211121.title: Taking the Plunge

133222122111211.content:
After what felt like a long journey Meilin now found herself really being squeezed by the muscles within Sakura's gullet; initially bewildered she realised what was happening when her legs started swaying in an openess, she was being forced through the pyloric sphincter that guarded the entrance to Sakura's belly. She tried to say 'Bon Apetit' but the pressure of Sakura's muscle made it impossible for her to draw breath for the next minute. Eventually she felt the firm flesh pushing on her face and found herself hanging from her forehead within the higher reaches of Sakura's stomach; her mind registered everything her senses picked up, the yoghurt had slid right past her and was now in the pool below her accompanied by other foods and Sakura's digestive juices so she took much longer to pass into the magical titaness's tummy. It seemed as though Sakura had gained control over her sphincter and was deliberately holding her there to let Meilin take everything in; just as Meilin started to suspect this the last push came and she plummeted down into the new quagmire.

With a *plop* Meilin landed in the mixture comprising of Sakura's lunch and her gastric juices. She surfaced only a few seconds later thankful that Sakura's charm made sure that her digestive fluids would not affect her in any way; it might as well have been water as far as Meilin was concerned. The only disruption to the fluid she found was all the food that made it into a thick swamp. One thing that struck Meilin as she floated there was that Sakura's stomach seemed so well-lit, it was as though the walls of the chamber themselves were emitting a soft pinkish light. Thinking it over she put it down to Sakura's immense magical power; not only was Meilin giving Sakura the opportunity to try out some bizarre fantasy but she was also being given a more pleasurable variant, Sakura both ensured that she would come to no harm inside her and even gave her a gentle illumination of the inside of her belly. Just then Meilin felt a strange surge going through the chamber, a rhythmic soft thud along with a steady wave in the mixture repeating itself for a while; then she heard Sakura speaking to her, her thunderous voice muffled by the distant sound of her heartbeat and the flesh that separated her from the outside world.

"Are you all right in there, Meilin-chan." She asked her little guest; Meilin wasn't sure how Sakura would be able to hear her from all the way up from her abdomen but she decided to try.

"YES, KINOMOTO!" Meilin yelled up. "ONCE YOU'RE OVER THE SHOCK IT'S A SPECTACULAR EXPERIENCE!" She coughed slightly as the yelling made her throat sore.

"No need to shout, Meilin-chan," Sakura told her, "The power of the Voice card allows me to hear you as clearly as you're sitting opposite me at regular size." Meilin pondered over that.

"And when I hear you?" She asked at her normal voice level.

"I don't think that's magic," Sakura responded, "I'm just mumbling into my chest." Meilin sighed and thought over what will happen next. "A word of advice," Sakura continued, "I'm not finished with lunch just yet so try not hang around under the entrance." Meilin actually giggled at that.

"Take all you want, Kinomoto." She replied. "My tiny tummy was filled up with that yoghurt; there's something I'm not gonna have for a while." Now it was Sakura's turn to giggle, which shook Meilin up so that it was like a Sakura-quake. Meilin spotted a piece of... something green, kinda like lettuce but not quite and most certainly not cabbage, and she thus swam through Sakura's digestive fluids and pulled herself onto it to use as a raft until it got dissolved to the extent that she could no longer fit on it. Sitting there Meilin looked back up the way she came; a loud groan signalled swallowing and she braced herself for the impact of whatever was being eaten. After what felt like half a minute another globule of yoghurt came pouring into the stomach, glooping into the quagmire. Meilin wondered what else Sakura had in her lunch and also considered what would happen once Sakura finished.
133222122111211.title: Visitor to the Belly

1332221221112112.content:
Once Sakura digested the greenery that Meilin had been improvising as a raft she then swam through the swamp of partially digested food until she found a piece of bread that had yet to dissolve; the soggy texture did not phase Meilin in any way as she felt that she had gotten used to the soggy sticky sensation of food inside the human body. She sat there watching Sakura finish the yoghurt that had brought her here, listening to the variety of sounds Sakura was making. There was the gentle beating of her giant heart, the gurgling and groaning of her stomach walls and the various sounds and sentances that Sakura was producing with her vocal chords.

When the bread was liquified Sakura had gone onto wasabi so Meilin now swam across to an arrangement of compacted rice, of which some grains had been chopped by Sakura's teeth and, to Meilin's surprise, had not retained any mositure except between the grains, keeping the rice raft together. As she lay there Meilin started to ponder something. She was in Sakura's stomach, she had been made immune to digestion and was swimming around in Sakura's lunch; she decided to ask her host something, but first she waited for the next mouthful of wasabi to splash down in the stomach.

"Kinomoto." Meilin queried.

"Yes, Meilin-chan?" Inquired Sakura's voice, reverberating around the chamber.

"How long am I going to be in here?" Meilin asked. There was a pause before Sakura answered.
1332221221112112.title: Lying Around in Lunch

13322212211122.content:
Sakura found that Meilin's taste was pretty much drowned out by the yoghurt; the whole reason she was doing this was to see what people tasted like. With that she decided that she needed a way to get more of Meilin on her tastebuds.

Within her mouth Meilin now realised that she had been tossed towards the front of the mouth, lying upon the tip of Sakura's ginormous pink tongue.

"Changed your mind, have you?" Meilin muttered, wondering if she might not end up taking a yoghurt slide into Sakura's stomach. All of a sudden she found herself thrusted up to the roof of the mouth, almost getting the wind knocked out of her as the power of Sakura's mighty tongue forced her against the hard palate. Meilin had only just managed to compensate for the lack of space for her lungs to expand in when she heard a great groaning sound and was nearly pulled down the slope of the tongue, feet first. 'She's swallowing,' Meilin realsied, 'But she doesn't want me to go down.' Before long the pressure between tongue and palate eased off and once again Meilin had a clear sensation of being inside a living cave.

Sakura continued to flick Meilin around her mouth; trying to get as much of the tiny girl's flavour while also attempting to make the experience more fun for Meilin. Now, what is Sakura's verdict about Meilin's taste?
