145312212121212121122.content: Maybe Rika Sasaki will make the first purchase.
145312212121212121122.title: Rika?

1453122121212121212.content: Now, will it be someone inside an illusion-inducing display box or one of the hotle tenants?
1453122121212121212.title: Which Front to go for?

14531221212121212121.content: Will it be a tiny man/boy or a woman/girl?
14531221212121212121.title: Gender

145312212121212121212.content:
Mimi Chouseau was just your ordinary French college student. At 19 years old she had been studying a few courses at a college in Lyon, only because of her desire to get a well-paid job and, in the existing economic climate, her chances weren't as good as they should've been. It was the end of the Easter holidays and she was riding the train back to Lyon and her dormitory. She was for sure not satisfied, all the hard work, the fees, the poor chances of finding employment when this final year was over.

Sitting by the window, looking out across the rolling hils of eastern France, she kept going over all the difficulties life threw at her before she began to daydream about the life she wanted. A big house, no need to go anywhere or do anything, and plenty of wealth.

She had been daydreaming for about seven minutes when it happened. Without warning her eyes were swamped with a bright light outside and various signs that suggested the train was undergoing an emergency stop. The intensity of the breaking meant that she was doubled over the small table in front of her and her daydream had been snapped; looking up she was glad that no one was sitting opposite her, thinking how embarrassing it would've been. She cast a look out the window, expecting to still see the fields of France while wondering what the flash was; what she saw instead was mind-blowing. She saw a long plateau that shone like silver with a great structure stretching high into the air, far higher than any building she'd seen before. She also noticed that the lights had gone off in the carriage.

While she wondered why there was no power getting through suddenly a tremor resounded through the train, followed by another, and a shadow fell upon a good portion of the plateau. Mimi looked up, expected to see a thundercloud, but instead came to the verge of screaming when she saw a massive feminine hand reaching for the train.
145312212121212121212.title: Mimi Chouseau

1453122121212121212121.content:
In just a few seconds Mimi now found the carriage being engulfed in darkness when the hand began to grab the train; only the middle and ring finger were on this particular carriage and yet they left no window uncovered. In spite of the darkness the giant's skin was still visible through a small amount of light coming between the gaps in the fingers. There was little time to comprehend this when everyone was tossed about as the train was effortlessly lifted off the ground.

By the time some stability had returned Mimi was now lying on top of another student, who turned out to be one of her friends, Laurence L'Hievres. They were sprawled across a larger table closer to the back of the train on the opposite side from where Mimi was. Picking themselves up they said hello and apologised to each other for the inconvenience when they realised that light was coming back into the carriage; nervously turning to the nearest window they were aghast at the sight of two gigantic eyes looking back at them. Laurence fainted in shock. Mimi quickly set her in an available chair before cautiously crawling across the seats to get a better look. Up above she saw the giantess's index finger protruding out and the thumb doing the same below, clearly indicating that the train was now pinched between them.

"I'm sorry I startled you," The giantess boomed, "But there was no other way." Mimi quivered in fright at the prospect of being totally helpless in this woman's grasp. When Laurence came to Mimi had learned that they were being held by a Japanese woman named Maki Matsumoto who had teleported them here and had also shrank them. Together the college friends now heard that they were now, effectively, property. The train and everyone on board was to be put on sale, with schoolgirls being the only ones to buy them.
1453122121212121212121.title: The Train to Twin Bells

14531221212121212121212.content:
Everyone on board reacted in many different ways. Some screamed and tried to escape, but the doors wouldn't budge, others tried to plead with Maki but their voices were too feeble for her to hear, and still others, like Mimi, just froze either from shock, submission or even both. As Maki stood up everyone in the train except two carriages were tossed about like salad; Mimi and Lawrence were amog the lucky ones, being able to stay in the seats if they braced themselves, thanks to Maki's thumb and forefinger steadying their carriage.

"Mother of God!" Lawrence exclaimed. "We're ants on sale! How could she do this, selling people like they're... seeds, or something?" Mimi just sighed as she finally came to a clear conclusion, after mulling over the facts.

"Lawrence," She said, "We have no choice. It would be dangerous to try and escape. Even if we were to succeed we'd either plummet to our doom or find ourselves facing danger round every corner, be it giants like her or hungry animals. Besides, who knows what she'd do if she caught us during an escape. It might be best to just let her put us up for sale, then maybe she'll treat us more like people." After that musing Lawrence had no means to respond as they were now knocked to and fro as Maki carried them off to her special lodgings for these little people.

When the tumbling stopped Mimi took another look out the window and, this time, saw the cuff of Maki's sleeve filling the view. Doing a check Mimi now noticed that her carriage was resting upon the giantess's ring finger. The reason for the change in orientation became apparent as she now saw the biggest train station ever coming into view, the rails didn't go very far beyond the platforms before a sheer drop occurred.

"I hope she knows we can't live on this train until we're bought." Mimi muttered, not sure whether her life would improve now or not. Barely a minute later the rough ride in Maki's fingers ended as the carriage clicked onto the rails and power was returned. Everyone now busied themselves sorting out their luggage, making sure that all got the right things. Fortunately no severe changes of inertia happened at this stage when Maki managed to slide the tiny train into the terminus at a speed it was designed for. When Mimi had gathered all her things she could now take a look outside, noticing that the station was very clean and well-crafted, figuring that either Matsumoto had shrank some grand station she was unfamiliar with or, failing that, went to a lot of trouble to make them feel more at home. Peering in both directions from the window she recognised that the train was being reversed into the station as she remembered which cabin was leading before the incident, and she now looked with awe as a finger bigger than a tree gently nudged the front end of the train along the track before letting friction do the rest. Looking at the platform again Mimi found that they were on platform...
14531221212121212121212.title: "Ladies and Gentlemen, we're now approaching...."

choices: Mimi guides Lawrence to an available room
Mimi tries again to calm her down
145312212121212121212121.content:
Mimi wasn't sure but it made sense to her that they must've been on the first train to have been brought here. With the train now at a stop Maki addressed them again.

"Please gather all the belongings you have and follow the signs to your rooms. You may decide whether to go in pairs or as individuals. Family rooms are available." Mimi was gobsmacked. They had barely been told that they were going on sale to some schoolgirls and now their captor was offering them quality accommodation.

"Come on, Lawrence," She commented, "We'd better get our stuff together." When Mimi returned to her original seat and found that, miraculously, her luggage wasn't scattered all over Lawrence was still stuttering over what was going on.

Eventually Mimi managed to help Lawrence get her luggage and made for the doors, which had earlier been opened by a conductor. Stepping out onto the platform Mimi noticed that there was no access to any of the other platforms. It made sense as she figured that the train was on sale with all passengers and crew, suddenly she felt a warm moist breeze as Maki's voice echoed throughout the station.

"COMPLIMENTARY ESSENTIALS ARE AVAILABLE AS ARE SIGNS TO DIRECT YOU TO WHATEVER AMENITIES YOU DESIRE." Mimi made the dare to turn round while Lawrence resisted; she looked on with awe as Maki's face loomed in the distance behind an array of passengers, some continuing towards the rear of the train, some standing there fighting the urge to turn and others gazing out at the titaness that had captured them. Eventually Mimi broke off her staring and continued to lead the paralyzed Lawrence to the stairs, escalators and lifts at the inner end of the platform. Mimi made sure that Lawrence wouldn't turn, figuring that if she was paralyzed now heaven only knew what would happen if she saw the giant lady's face filling the vista outside the station.

On the way Mimi marvelled at the decor of the station. Clean as a whistle with glass panels giving those on different platforms a look at the rest. Where she was there was no such view until the end of the train, seeing as how they were on platform one, with the outer wall to her left. Upon ascending to the next level she now found herself in a long corridor with a few signs pointing in different directions. She looked back again and noticed that all she could see was the platform and locomotive of the train at the bottom of the stairs.

"It's all right." She mentioned to Lawrence, hoping to help her cope. "The giant woman's gone now." But Lawrence wasn't fooled.

"No, she's not." She responded. "She'll never be gone. We'll be amongst giants for the rest of our lives!" What happens next?
145312212121212121212121.title: What a Road to Run a Railway

1453122121212121212121211.content:
"Don't worry," Said Mimi, "I'll stay with you. Come on; we might as well make the most of it." Lawrence began the descent from restrained hysteria to rational calm as Mimi took her by the hand and sought out a two-person room with twin beds. As Lawrence slipped out of her stunned state she became defiant.

"This must be a dream." She said. "There's no way this could really happen. I'll wake up in a minute." Mimi soon found that the two-person rooms were already filling up when she found the correct corridor. By now Lawrence had become rather angry and had startled Mimi; the feel of Mimi's hand had told her that it was really happening. "Why did she do this to us?!? We've done nothing wrong! It's imprisonment without trial!"

"How many prisons have such luxurious lodgings?" Mimi reasoned as she found a room. There were twin beds on either side of a tall window opposite the door, off to the side was a sofa with a widescreen TV complete with a VCR and DVD player to watch. There certainly seemed to be plenty of drawers and the wardrobes were spacious enough. There even seemed to be a laundry chute and a hi-fi system. When Mimi sat Lawrence down and brought all their luggage in her friend was now thinking about bargaining with Maki.

"Perhaps we could negociate our return to France at proper size." She mentioned. "If we could serve her for a while she'll take pity on us." Mimi sighed as she unpacked her own things and checked the en-suite. It came complete with a roomy bath, separate shower booth and even had a bidet. Finding it unbelievably appreciative, wondering if Matsumoto had some tiny maids helping her run the place, she returned to the room itself to provide a listener to Lawrence's progress. She was now sitting slumped on one of the beds. "We're nothing now." She groaned in dispair. "We're just bugs for her to banter about. Our lives are over one way or another. We're dead." Mimi resisted the pessimism. She stood, still listening to Lawrence, and went over to the window, finding a view looking out across the giant room the hotel was in and overlooking...
1453122121212121212121211.title: Getting a Room for Two

14531221212121212122122122.title: China?

145312212121212121221221221.content:
Hou Xu Che had been educated by the Chinese government for many years and now, at the age of sixteen, he was disgruntled with the way the Communist Party was running things. Along with many other students he was planning on staging a protect in Tinnamen Square. He had gathered all his things together and was ready to leave the next day.

When he woke up everything seemed normal as he prepared. But when he set off something was not right at all. He saw a barbed wire barricade all around the house. Figuring the government had been tipped off he became infuriated and threw himself at the barricade as a gesture of defiance. Instead of becoming lacerated on the wire he was knocked back by something. The landing gave him a bit of bruising but nothing serious.

Later on he and his parents wondered about what was happening. His father, Tan Xu Che, attempted to gain the attention of any soldiers around, trying to lift this siege by pledging surrender. His mother, Min Qa Che, gingerly reached over the barricade and found her arm being repelled like it received a mild electric shock, except there was no feeling of an electric shock. This was very bewildering for them.
145312212121212121221221221.title: Hou Xu Che

1453122121212121212212212211.content:
All three of them eventually decided to go back inside and attempt to sit it out until there was a call for them to give in to the government's demands. They ate some food for lunch, moderating themselves in the hopes that the supply would not run out. They were all feeling frustrated by what had happened.

The day went by with them attempting to make the most of a bad job. They tried both practical activities and games to pass the time before the night drew in and they settled down into bed.

The next morning Tan found a surprise on the doorstep. A large container inside of which was a collection of provisions that would be about normal for a family of three in the West but, for the Che family, it was a selection beyond anything they'd ever seen. Hou suspected that the government was trying to bribe them while Tan had a suspicion that some persons were covertly supplying them.

As time went on this happened every morning as they attempted to cope with the isolation. By the time the truth would be revealed they would have been in this situation for...
1453122121212121212212212211.title: Bizarre Entrapment

14531221212121212122122122112.content: The Che family were cut off from all other life for...
14531221212121212122122122112.title: A Week?

145312212121212121221221221121.content:
When they had been cut off for one week the Che family wondered if they would be stuck with this forever. Hou thought about all of his friends who would be missing him and Tan fretted over the fact that his not being at work would let his comrades down. But today they were in for a shock.

---

Sakura and her friends browsed over the tiny pieces of civilisation, thinking over the cost and the implications of being in possession of real live people. Peering through the glass cabinets they found that the lighting inside was totally different to that of the room, their shadows did not fall on the buildings and people inside them. Eventually one of them caught sight of the simple design of the eighties Chinese house occupied by the Che family. She found herself taking particular interest and, after due consideration, decided to purchase it. Who shall buy them?

14531221212121212122222.title: Towns?

1453122122.content:
As American Airlines Flight 1420 skidded across the runway the pilots struggled to reduce speed; just as their aircraft reached the end of the runway, everything changed. In a flash they now found themselves skidding across what appeared to be a wooden surface made of planks that were of a scale that only sequoia could rationally supply. Fortunately they now had plenty of room to slow to a stop, although the gaps between the floorboards made it a bumpy ride. Eventually they did come to a stop and both crew and passengers breathed a sigh of relief.

Hinomata stopped in her tracks and looked round in a state of bewilderment. It sounded like a mouse was scurrying through the hall while an aircraft flew by in the distance. As a maid to the Daidouji family she felt it her responsibility to check on the situation.

The cabin crew of Flight 1420 prepared to commence evacuation of the aeroplane, unaware of how serious the situation was. They were now in another dimension and had been shrunk to the size of insects; right now their flight was sitting in the middle of a mansion's hall in the path leading to a broom cupboard, and a giant maid was coming in their direction.
1453122122.title: Sakura and the Strange Safety Scenario

14531221222.content:
It has been three hours since the american navy crew have gone into the vast sea on their submarine and down underwater. They were usually patrolling the ocean or simply trying to study the sea life from below, either way, it was all work and no play for this powerful navy force as they were effectively unstoppable. "Hm...so far so good, crew, we see no threat going on among this huge ocean." Said the captain as he searched for anything unusual around and so far, no danger have been sighted.

"Shall we go further into the sea? I'm pretty sure there's gotta be something beyond." Asked one of the crew.

"You're right, I guess there might be something we never see before so we should go a bit deeper into the sea and search for something." Replied the captain as he and his crew now began to slowly dive towards the ocean floor and searched around.

They found many aquatic creatures swimming around freely, some seaweed drifting across the sea, colorful corals, and among other things that you can pretty much find in the sea. Suddenly a signal from the sonar machine informed them it had picked up a sound that seems to be coming somewhere further ahead. "Captain, there's seem to be a strange sound coming from over there." Said one of the navy soldiers.

"What do you think it is?". The captain approached the sonar signal machine and once he was about to say something, the whole sub started to rumble and shake as it seems to be pulled into something. "What the hell is happening?" Yelled the captain.

"It seems we're being pulled in by some strong force." Yelled a female crew member. "I don't think we have enough speed to escape something that strong."

"Then we'll just have to use maximum power." Said the captain as he ordered the sailors to speed up as fast as they can. Unfortunately, it still wasn't fast enough and soon the entire submarine was pulled into the strange force and everyone, including the captain, blacked out.

A few minutes passed since the incident and everyone regained consciousness. "Is everyone all right?" Asked the captain as everyone nodded. They looked around to see what just happened; the captain, meanwhile, was looking straight at the large front window. There was pretty much nothing in sight, just blue water and that's pretty much it, no seaweed, corals, or even aquatic animals. "Strange, where did everything go?" The captain asked himself. Suddenly, a drop of water from a small crack dropped into his mouth, even the water tasted weird, it doesn't even taste salty but more like......chlorine?

(Unaware to them, they'd been shrunken down to almost mite-sized and ended up in the middle of a colossal swimming pool in a another dimension.)
14531221222.title: Into the deep end

choices: The giant girl stops before them
145312212221.content:
The place still looked kind of empty, but the captain and the crew decided to look for some life through a periscope and see if they could find anything that is related to any life form.

Looking through the water, they found no signs of life, but they did manage to find something beyond the water. It's too blury to make it out even with a periscope but they could still make out the shape of the object; the bottom seemed to be two circular tower-like structures, but at the top, they seemed to be connected to a much larger object that has two other structures on each side of it. "What do you think that..thing is, captain?" Asked the female soldier, but before the captain could say anything, the entire structure begin to move much like a person would as the two structures below walked like legs.

"Oh my god! It looks like it's heading right towards our exact location, sir." Yelled one of the navy soldiers. They watch as the towering object walked towards the tiny sub, but when it got closer, they slowly begin to see it in more detail. The giant object they saw wasn't even an object at all, instead it was a colossal human-shape figure that exceeded even the size of the Empire state building by comparison. It seems to have a young feminine shape, probably that of a preteen, and the figure wore a red two-piece swimming costume. "It's not a giant structure," Said the captain, "It's just a giant girl."

"And we're not in the ocean," one of the crew added, "We're in the middle of a gigantic swimming pool!"

"We could discuss this weird situation but right now we've got to get out of here!" Yelled one of the navy soldiers.
145312212221.title: In the middle of a swimming pool

1453122122212.content:
Unfortunately for them, the giantess was too quick for them to make a getaway as they all in fear as she unknowingly begin to make her way towards the tiny sub. "Oh crap, we're doomed!!!" Yelled one of the crew. The giantess got closer and closer, but right as the navy soldiers all began to take cover for the upcoming impact, the giantess suddenly stopped just a few miles from their current location. The soldiers all came out of their hiding spots and looked outside through the window. From left and right, they saw two long, large towers that were the legs. Looking up high, they saw the giantess's torso far up near the surface.

"What do you think she's doing, sir?" Asked the female soldier, when suddenly the radar picked up a brand-new sound.

"What's this?" The captain wondered as he investigated the noise.

The captain soon approaches the radar system and listed real carefully. The noise was revealed to be a muffled sound of someone talking in the native language of Japan, it seemed to come from the giantess high above. "Does anybody around here speak Japanese?" Asked the captain as he looked around everyone else.
1453122122212.title: Trying to understand Japanese

choices: They suddenly heard a loud splashing noise (Tomoyo jumping into the pool)
Another voice is heard (Tomoyo asking if the others could join the giantess)
14531221222121.content:
The captain soon heard a response from a solder at the back corner; a young woman with short black hair. "Sir, let me translate. After all I've been to Japan once so this will be easy for me." She said. The captain agreed and let her sit down on a chair next to the radar system. The woman began to listen real closely at the voices coming from the system:

"Watashi wa Tomoyo-chan o iwanakereba naranai, mizu ga ī kyō kanjite imasu." ("I have to say Tomoyo, the water feels nice today.")

"Nani ga imi suru yō ni natte iru kotodeshou ka?" ("What's that supposed to mean?")

"Watashi wa tokidoki anata no kokoro, Tomoyo-chan ni attadarou ka..." ("I sometimes wonder what's on your mind, Tomoyo...")

"Anatagasukinara, naze sō, anata ga sanka suru kanōsei ga arimasu." ("Why yes, you could join in if you like.)

"Dōitashimashite" ("You're welcome")

The conversation between the giantess and an unknown individual named "Tomoyo" soon stopped as the crew mumbled about the conversation, wondering who was "Tomoyo" and what did the giantess meant by "joining in".
14531221222121.title: Translation

choices: They successfully got out of the way.
145312212221212.content:
Before anyone could think of anything else, the system caught another voice from the giantess:

"Tashika ni, hokanohito ga amarini mo ni sanka shitai to shimasu." ("Sure, the others will like to join in too.")

"I...don't like where this is going..." Said a crew member. Suddenly, the system picks up what sounded like water splashing from behind the tiny sub. A female sailor rushed to the periscope and began to search for the source of the noise. In the distance, she spotted a large figure standing there. A moment later, the figure began to walk right towards their position.

"Guys, I think we should go now." She told the others as she closed the periscope.

"Why? What do you see there?" Asked the captain. Before she could say something, the entire sub started rumbling as she quickly raised the periscope again and saw a pair of gigantic, pale-skinned feet standing right behind the sub. Looking up past the feet and legs, she could make out a blue one-piece with frills at the bottom of it.

"Could that be this Tomoyo person that giant girl was talking about?" Asked one of the sailors. The radio signal once again picked out the conversation between these giantesses.

"I got this guys!" Called out the same woman who translated the Japanese language.

"Anata ga tadashī! Mizu wa, Sakura-chan īdesu!" ("You're right! The water is nice, Sakura-chan!")

"Tashikani!" ("Indeed!")

"Chotto mite! Hokanohito ga tōchaku shimashita." ("Hey look! The others have arrived.")

"Kon'nichiwa, min'na-san!" ("Hi guys!")

"This doesn't mean what I think it means, does it?" Asked one of the navy officers, nervously.

"Unfortunately...yes" Said the woman as the system picked out three sounds of splashing. The female sailor on the periscope looked right across to the source and saw not one, but three figures all standing near the two giantesses. The one on the left wore a pink one-piece, the one in the middle is wearing a black and white one-piece, and the one on the right is wearing a green two-piece (Unlike the first giantess who's bottom part resembles shorts, the bottom part of this resembles a skirt).

"Rika-chan! Naoko-chan! Chiharu-chan! Ureshī kimitachi wa sore o tsukurimashita." ("Rika-chan! Naoko-chan! Chiharu-chan! Glad you guys made it.")

"No wa, ikutsu ka no tanoshimi o mo~tsuu jaarimasen ka?" ("Let's have some fun, shall we?")

The sailor watched as the three giantesses walked towards their exact location before quickly closing the periscope and warning the others. "We gotta get out of the way FAST!" She yelled as the captain agreed and told the others to steer the sub.
145312212221212.title: The big arrival

1453122122212121.content:
"LET'S GO!!" Yelled the captain as the sailors went full speed ahead. The submarine itself wasn't that very fast, but since they were very tiny, the giantesses walked real slowly to them which gives them plenty of time to escape before they're crushed. The female sailor put up the periscope again and saw that they were now slightly further away from the three.

"This is it! We're going to make it!" She called out to the others.

"Good work troops! We'll soon escape and probably have enough time to figure out a way to get out of this strange world." Said the captain as the others tried their best to steer the sub quicker.

The submarine eventually got even further away from those giantesses and was now slowly reaching the edge of the pool. "Perfect! We could stop there and try to think of a plan!" Said one of the sailors. The captain agreed and told him and the others to go straight ahead. At first, they don't seem to think they will have any problems reaching the edge when suddenly the front window darkened for a bit.

"What...was that?" Asked the captain when the navigator got him the answer: it was the first giantess they encountered and she was swimming right above them. They watched as she now slowly lowered both of her legs and stood on the pool floor; her enormous body having now completely blocked their path.

"Crap! Now how we going to pass her?" Asked one of the sailors as he and the others looked at the front window and noticed that they were in front of the giantess's thighs; they were also slightly open too. They could slip past between them as they were the right size to do so, but it could be pretty dangerous as she could close her legs and crush them if they aren't fast enough. They could just go past them to the left/right since their size made them quicker than the giantess yet there's still a catch to this; any slight movement from her could still pose a treat to them.

Which path can they take?
1453122122212121.title: The gates

14531221222121211.content:
"The shortest route will take us right between her legs," The captain pointed out, "It's a gamble but it's our best option. Full ahead flank!" The submarine powered forwards, straight between the giant girl's thighs, while one of the officers kept a check on how she stood in the hopes of catching any movement in time for them to manoeuvre.

As they go through the two fleshy towers, the others watched as they, much to their relief, are still on hold for now. However, they could see some very slight movement such as bobbing left and right, but so far no signs of bigger movements. They wonder what the giantess is doing right now since she's still standing there; she's probably talking to one of her friends or something. "We're almost there everyone! Let's keep it up quick!" Shouted the captain as he looked out the window on the right side of the sub and saw something that made him nervous. The fleshy wall gave a slow movement before very slowly began to descend towards the submarine; she was about to close up both of her legs and unknowingly crush them between them!

"Captain! That giant girl is go..."

"Yes I know!" The captain interrupted the navigator's warning. "Quick everyone, full speed ahead before these 'walls' close down on us!"

"Sorry captain, but that's all the speed we have." Yelled the officer.

The captain doesn't know what to do now as the fleshy towers slowly approached. If they aren't fast enough, they'll have no choice but to abandon ship immediately and escape without the sub. They are pretty close to the exit so maybe they'll just hope they have enough speed to get the hell out of here.
14531221222121211.title: Pasting the gates

choices: Switch to the ones on the giantess
Switch to the others going straight to the other giantesses
145312212221212112.content:
The captain thought of a solution, but it was a real risk to take. "Everyone, I don't think we're gonna make it! I'm afraid we have no choice, but to...abandon our submarine and get the hell out of here!" He yelled. At first, the crew opposed his idea, but seeing how they were at risk of getting smashed by the giantess's legs, they didn't have much choice. Soon everyone except the navigator, who was tasked to look around one more time before leaving. She didn't see much other than the giantess, but once she looked down towards the floor of the pool at her feet, she saw that they were slowly beginning to lift up to a tiptoe position. "What do you see?" Asked the captain.

"By the looks of it, she's probably going to jump towards the surface to swim." She said as she left her post to join the others.

At the storage room, everyone else had put on scuba diving suits to breathe underwater. They had also fitted radio transmission devices to communicate with each other just in case something happens to themselves along the way. "Alright, are you all ready?!" Yelled the captain as everyone else nodded. The captain led them towards the emergency exit and, one by one, the crew rushed out the door and into the pool waters. Everyone was told that, for safety purposes, they must take separate paths and hope that they'll reunite with each other once they escape the deadly trap.

Fortunately, they have managed to escape successfully just before the giant girl closed her legs along with the abandoned sub. Unfortunately, this was proven to be just as dangerous as before.

The giantess' cheerful energy didn't do the sub's crew any favours as her motions produced such strong currents they had little control over where they could go. Some were sent swirling through a series of vortices that slammed them into the waistline of her swimming costume while others got knocked away from her legs and out into more open areas in the pool. However, for the time being, they could maintain communication by way of radio transmission. Unfortunately the communications officer knew better than the others that these transmitters were on limited battery power.

They also didn't know that they were about to be sent towards the nearby giantesses along the way.
145312212221212112.title: Abandon ship!

1453122122212121122.content:
"AHHHH!!!!" One of the remaining group of the crew found themselves getting swept by the powerful currents caused by the giantesses. They can't swim back to the others because of it and try to their best to stick together for safety. This goes on for a good ten minutes before they managed to find themselves landing on something soft. They quickly grab on to it and found themselves on a pale fleshy tower. "Everyone, don't let go!" Yelled out one of them as they try their best to hold on. They don't know who they were grabbing on to until they saw the large blue frills above them that indicated the giantess was in fact the one called "Tomoyo" and they were grabbing on to her right leg.

The second group found themselves latching on to a pink material on the front of the swimsuit belonging to the one called "Rika". The third group ended up on the back of the black and white one piece swimwear which belonged to the one called "Naoko". Finally the fourth and last group landed themselves and grabbed on to the green swim skirt owned by the one called "Chiharu". They all seemed to be okay, but struggling on to keep themselves alive.

"I think we should call the captain on our radio transmitter and tell him that we're safe." Said the one with blonde hair.

"I don't think so. Maybe we should tell the other groups that we're all safe and we should make a plan together." Said a female soldier. "Keep in mind that we've only got limited battery power so we really shouldn't waste it."

What do they do now?
1453122122212121122.title: Contact

choices: Switch to the captain and the others
14531221222121211222.content:
"I guess that's a good idea. Let's go!"

The soldiers turned on their transmitters and hope they could pick up the others. Luckily, they quickly heard the voices and try to talk to them. They began to start their conversation:

"Is everything alright?"

"Yes, we're fine! We are just still in a struggle to survive, that's all!"

"We need to find a way to keep ourselves safe!"

"How can we?"

"I think the only way to find out was...to climb them."

"Are you serious? That's too risky!"

"What other choice we have, we don't want to end up hanging around here."

"He's right, we could somewhere to hide in before things get worse."

"I guess agree, but we better be extra careful, who knows what these giants are up to."

"I agree, we need to find a suitable shelter on them somewhere..."

After their quick conversation, they soon began the main motive of finding a safe spot.
14531221222121211222.title: communication

choices: Follow both the lone and rest of the escaped souls
145312212221212112221.content:
In other to prevent confusion when trying to contact once more, they decided to give out names for each groups:

Sub Group Alpha: The Main Giantess

Sub Group Beta: Tomoyo

Sub Group Gamma: Rika

Sub Group Delta: Naoko

Sub Group Epsilon: Chiharu

Now that they're ready, the crew finally start their destination.

Sub Group Alpha were still stuck to their hostress' waistline as they struggle to escape. This soon changed into clinging on to it as she began to swim across the water with such speed that it made them hold on even harder. However, they managed to get a glimpse of her huge face as it was now near the surface. They discovered that she has bright, emerald-green eyes and short, brown hair; they couldn't find more about her features other than that. As they grabbed on, one of them managed to escape somehow and began to swim towards the girl's face with all his strength; because they were too busy struggling, neither of the crews noticed.

After what appeared to be minutes of survival at the waistline, the giantess eventually stopped and many of the crew members ended up getting peeled off from her swimsuit. The senior officer of the group announced. "We must try to determine the cause of our predicament as much as get out of this situation. Make for the surface by any means. Our only option is to let this girl carry us out of the water; after that it'll depend on the circumstances of our reaching a safer position." The group who escaped began to swam up; deciding to reach the young giantess' head in order to find any sort of shelter to be safe. However, little did they know that a lone crew member almost managed to reach the head at the surface. As for the ones still stuck, they began thinking of an easier way to get on top.
145312212221212112221.title: Start climbing!

1453122122212121122213.content:
Meanwhile, Sub Group Beta are still holding on to Tomoyo's right leg. They stood there as they felt her walking through the pool; which to them felt like riding on a giant tortoise due to their tiny sizes. When she finally stopped, the crew knew they couldn't stay much longer as they have no idea what will be this girl's next move. Their senior officer declared. "We cannot remain here. Apart from the whole issue of being so low down upon a girl's swimsuit."

"I agree with you, sir." Said a young submariner. "But where do you think should we go besides here?" Their officer answered.

"We're still at risk of her clenching her legs. We must make for her torso, at least we'll have a better chance there."

"Sounds like a plan." Said a young woman. "I just hope nothing happens to us along the way."

The entire troop began to crawl their way up the giantess' leg. Luckily to them, it wasn't too hard since most of them used the tiny hairs on her leg (which were just the right size for them) as extra grips along the way. The only hard part about this was getting past the colossal mountain-sized knee, but they managed to climb over it (which was almost like mountain climbing) while a few of them just went in opposite directions. After a long climb, they stopped at the middle of Tomoyo's thigh when they saw the large, blue frills of her swimsuit. These frills seemed to be blocking their path to the girl's torso.

"Anyone have any idea how to get past them?" Said a blonde soldier.
1453122122212121122213.title: Sub Group Beta

14531221222121211222132.content:
Meanwhile, another group of submariners ended up getting launched into the swimsuit of the one called "Rika". As they grabbed on to the fabric, they felt the giantess begin to move around, carrying them along for the ride. While this happened, they tried to climb upwards with all their might but, unfortunately, due to both the intense water pressure and the fibers (which were completely waterlogged) of her swimsuit, they found themselves glued to the pink fabric.

The senior officer advised, "Taking into account our surroundings at this time, I am of the opinion that this young girl is something of a novice swimmer." Those who could looked up and down, accounting for the fact that the giant girl's feet were more clearly visible from here and the bright light indicated that the surface wasn't far. "Our best option at this time is to try and make for the surface and hitch a ride back to terra firma on the young lady."

"I'm afraid that could be a problem, sir." Said one of the troops. "The water pressure is too strong here and we're also kinda stuck to the fibers of this girl's swimsuit."

"Then we'll just have to keep trying!" Replied a naval woman.

With all of their might, they climbed up the young girl's body, but it became quite a challenge for them as they continued to fight against the pressure that was pushing them into the waterlogged fabric.
14531221222121211222132.title: Sub Group Gamma

choices: Look at the situation from the girls' perspective.
145312212221212112221322.content:
Meanwhile, another group are currently latching on to the back of the one called "Naoko". They try to hold on as hard as they can but, due to the girl's movements, have found it very tricky to do so as it was causing strong water currents to swirl around them. Gaining open water has just become a challenge.

Their senior officer remarked. "In view of our inability to swim for it we'll have to attempt to find a better perch upon this girl. Climb towards her shoulder. We should find a good position from there."

"Let's hope so, it appears this turbulence is dangerously strong."Said a female navy officer. She was right, they'll be blown away to who knows where if they aren't careful so they have to both climb and hold on at the same time.

The path up to the giantess's shoulder was still a long one but, nonetheless, no troops have been blown off...yet. Even though her movements were steady, it still was enough to create some strong currents around them.

Occasionally, they could hear the girl's faint voice from above.
145312212221212112221322.title: Sub Group Delta

choices: Return to Group Gamma or Delta (Rika/Naoko)
1453122122212121122213222.content:
Meanwhile, the last group were clinging for dear life on the green swim skirt wore by the one called "Chiharu". They can't help but feel a lot more vulnerable than ever at this point. Climbing over it proves to be quite a challenge too as the turbulence caused by her swimming swirled everywhere around them.

Their senior officer announced. "We are in direct line of fire from the currents these girls can produce. Make for her torso and find any place on her that'll be calm. I know this could cause some difficulties under normal circumstances but I'm sure we can all agree that these are not normal circumstances."

"Yes captain!" Everyone shouted as they were nearly in reach of the waistline.

"We're almost there!" Said one officer.

The currents were slowly getting stronger, but with all their strength they finally managed to get on top of her skirt and everyone decided to wait for the waters to calm down and hold on to the girl's skin.
1453122122212121122213222.title: Sub Group Epsilon

choices: Switch to the captain and the others
Switch to Sakura and her friends
14531221222121211222132222.content:
Group Alpha

The mariners stuck on the girl's body began to climb up the body after coming up with a solution to their problems. Meanwhile, the ones that are unstuck think that they have it easier since they can just swim up to the surface as they were now close to the surface; however, that is going to change once she goes back to swimming. Now this time it's the ones swimming who are having a much more difficult time thanks to the currents caused by the giantess's movement. Fortunately, they're still able to keep up as the girl was swimming slowly in order to meet up with one of her friends who they could see in the distance. The ones climbing up her body have it easy, but due to the turbulence, they needed to hold onto the fabric of her swimsuit as they were now on the upper torso, just above her chest.

Once they finally made their way up to the girl's head, they found themselves nearly getting tangled by her auburn hair. At first, they tried to get around them until the senior captain got a message from a fellow troop who beat them to the head from the radio transmitter.

"Grab on to her hair and meet me up there, trust me it's worth doing that instead of using the skin of her face." He said.

"Where are you right now?" Said the Captain.

"Just go through the strands, I'll tell you soon."

He and the rest of the force grabbed on tightly to the strands of hair. They then climbed across them as fast as they could while the girl swam through the water. It wasn't very easy since her hair was wet from the pool water; however, the crew didn't have to travel too far.

"Where are you right now?" Said the man.

"Where right near the ear." Said the Captain. "Why did you ask?"

"Because that's where me and the rest of the troop are right now. They told me that they were missing you and the others once they climbed up and came here."

Everybody saw the large ear within the thicket and jumped inside of it. They grabbed onto the edge and hauled themselves up.

"I'm glad you all made it." Said the one from the radio. He is with several other people who made it too.

Group Beta

The group were currently pondering on how to get past the frills; they tried to climb over it, but a few of them ended up getting stuck on it. It was difficult to free themselves from the frills, but they managed to get out after several seconds. They did not got a chance to think of a plan because suddenly, Tomoyo started moving her legs. She lifted herself from the pool floor and began to swim across the water. Because this happened so unexpectedly and the crew were still thinking, they didn't get a chance to prepare for the girl's current movements. They were raised up in the air before falling back down into the water by her propelling legs. When viewed from the girls' perspective, Tomoyo is just firmly moving across the pool, but for her passengers, it's a wild ride to keep themselves from getting flung off.

"Don't let go everyone!" Yelled one of them.

Unfortunately, they couldn't hold on to the legs much longer and, thus, were all sent flying straight forwards along with the splashes from her swimming.

They eventually landed on something soft and full with strands of some sort. It didn't take much longer to realise that they'd landed on Tomoyo's hair, near the cliff which is her face. Everyone clung to the strands as hard as they could while the giantess made her way to one of her friends. As she got there, they both started a conversation among themselves; they couldn't understand what they're saying and even if they did, the booming sounds of their voices was quite hard to hear. Just when they thought they were safe, Tomoyo then nodded her head in agreement with something which caused the others to slip and tumble down her enormous face; they landed on her upper lip and below her nostrils. They were in great danger right now since she currently talking with her friend. One of them got an idea, however this one is hugely risky.

"We got to take cover from up there." She said as she pointed to the nostrils. "We have no other choice as it's the only available shelter at this point."

They didn't get a chance to start their climb as, just then, Tomoyo inhaled through her nose, causing everyone to get sucked in. Fortunately, they quickly grabbed onto the giant nose hairs right at the very moment they entered the nose. Unfortunately, they ended up getting separated from each other as they ended up in different nostrils. They could; however, communicate with their transmitters, but they remembered that they have limited batteries so they needed to use them wisely.

Group Gamma

After struggling to get above, they finally reached Rika's upper torso when they managed to unstick themselves from her swimsuit. The mariners think that they could swim up and reach higher up, but they began to notice that this young girl was now moving towards deeper waters.

"Is it me or is this girl is now going deeper into water?" Asked a young man.

"It appears so." Said another one. "But will this give us a much harder chance?"

Everyone thought for several seconds when, suddenly, Rika started to move frantically in the water. Since she's not used to swimming, she struggled to get up. Everyone around her tried to keep themselves from being swept away. Behind them, they could see her friend trying to help her with her swimming. They wanted to go towards her, but their attempts were cut short when they saw the gigantic mouth of Rika getting closer to them. It was already too late to swim away as the current sucked them inside her open mouth.

Inside, everyone grabbed onto the teeth, gums, tongue, and everything else that they could see in the darkness. The girl then spat out the water from her mouth after she made it to the surface, leaving everyone just dangling inside.

"Everybody around here, alright? Just give us a sign." Called the senior officer from the tongue.

Everybody called to the officer in the loudest voice possible.

"Good, it's best to remain here until further notice." He said. "Try not to get swallowed by this young lady."

Everyone agreed, but how long could they hold on?

Group Delta

The group's attempt to get up to Naoko's shoulders was unfortunately cut short when she lifted her arms to swim a little faster. The crew were soon launched higher and higher until they were flinged up into the air at neck breaking speeds. They barely got a chance to make out the surface world when they found themselves falling down and onto the girl herself. The group landed on her forehead and then tumbled their way down to her eyes.

"Quick everyone, grab on to the eyelashes." Yelled the senior officer and everyone obeyed his command.

Now latching onto the lashes, they try to keep themselves safe as much as they can. While her glasses made their view distorted, they can still make out another girl talking to Naoko. Suddenly, they got a call from the crew on the other side and told them that they're okay, but they also got another plan.

"Try to get in her eyelids, it's much safer there." One of them said. "Don't bother contacting this girl from her eye, we tried that and it didn't work. So focus on surviving for now."

Everyone climbed up across the lashes and made their way to the lid. It was pretty cramped around here, but it's for the best.

Group Epsilon

Chiharu seems to be relaxing by herself as there isn't much she could do right now. With this going on, the crew have a much easier situation to get higher up. However, it appears the distance to get to the surface is far greater than they could have imagined; it would probably take much longer to get there before this girl starts moving again.

"I don't think we're going to last very long." Said a young woman.

"Is there anything else we could do right now?" Said an older officer.

"Well there is that over there." Said an older woman, pointing at the large hole above them, which is Chiharu's belly button.

Not wasting any time, they made their way towards the navel. One by one, they grabbed onto the edge and hauled themselves up inside. After every last one of them got inside the girl's belly button, they travelled deeper into the fleshy tunnel.

"Wow, I guess we should call ourselves NAVEL officers." Chuckled a wise guy. "Get it?"

"No time for jokes here, lad." Said an older man.

Afterwards, they stopped in the middle of Chiharu's navel and sat down waiting for her upcoming action.

1453122122221.content:

choices: A short-circuit manages to temporarily turn the equipment into a shrink ray.
A sound causes Harold to jump.
An enchantment on the gear is triggered by Harold's meddling.
14531221222213.content:
Harold hadn't known what he just been through but he could now identify that he was on a street somewhere, although he wasn't entirely sure where, with a great big house just over a set of railings. The sun was sinking and night wouldn't be far behind; other buildings were visible but this was the most obvious choice. Access wasn't hard, suggesting to him he could appeal to the residents to let him doss down for a bit, however what he'd entered through was the tradesman's entrance.

Crossing a portion of the grounds that had a more utilitarian setup compared to the others Harold came upon a side-entrance to the house proper and promptly knocked. He waited for a while but no answer came, prompting him to conclude that the house was empty or that everyone was in bed, so he let himself in and began to hesitantly nosey-round the servants' quarters, taking a few biscuits to nibble and having a swig of water from a kitchen tap. It so happened that the lack of a response was more to do with the fact that the house was currently operating on a 'skeleton crew' and he was supposed to have pressed the buzzer, for no one was anywhere near the side-entrance to hear him knock.

Harold watched the light through the window fade and began to search for somewhere he could rest without getting into any trouble should someone stumble on him while he slept. Wandering through the mansion he rapidly dismissed a number of rooms as looking too good to chance before he seemed to run out of options and looked back through the rooms he'd dismissed. It could've been considered lucky that he constantly missed every member of staff in residence. Snooping around what he thought was just a sitting room he stumbled upon an annex that resembled a private cinema and began to poke around.
14531221222213.title: Lost

choices: Tomoyo comes home as he sleeps.
A maid enters the room while he sleeps.
He sleeps right through the night.
Someone else enters the room while he sleeps.
145312212222131.content:
Harold had poked around a little too much, causing a sudden burst of what he thought was merely static electricity, which knocked him unconscious as it hurled him back into the room he thought of as a sitting room. In the process the meddling had briefly made the equipment into a shrinking device, causing him to quickly dwindle from his 5' 8½" height down to only ½", one hundred and thirty-seven times smaller than normal.

After a few minutes passed Harold came to, feeling woozy as he groaned over his nosey habits. Picking himself up he then stared at his surroundings, gawking in disbelief. He did his best to pinch himself and then jogged over to a support for a piece of furniture and slammed his head against it, trying to find any evidence that he wasn't actually experiencing this. Eventually he began to register that this most certainly was occurring and he slumped down and held his knees to his chest, wondering if he'd been displaced into a land of giants or if he really had shrunk down.

The night rolled on and the light inside the room dropped to the point that Harold couldn't make out much colour, however the filtered street light and some of the natural light of the stars with some suggestion of a moon allowed him to identify all available shapes in the room. If nothing else he could find somewhere he could get some shut-eye; mindful of potential pests wandering around he sought out the edge of a curtain and tucked himself into a fold at the bottom.
145312212222131.title: Harold Half-Pint

choices: A magical tome. (Deliberately shrinking; goes horribly right)
The jobs pages. (Going undercover as a domestic)
1453122122222.content:
The reporter had periodically passed the Daidouji estate few a couple of weeks now, trying to figure out how to get the story the editor had been hyping on about for months. This family was a bit of an enigma to the papers, particularly when some women who had been in their service made mention of some curious incidents that were particularly tied in with the young Tomoyo Daidouji.

After some time the reporter opted to take a break at a nearby café to try and figure how they could possibly infiltrate this private home to uncover all their particular quirks and suchlike. The answer lay in...
1453122122222.title: Pint-Sized Paparazzi

14531221222223.content:
It was a long time since anyone from the paper had to sneak into a house to get their story, but this reporter was absolutely intent on gaining access to the Daidouji mansion to find out what kind of things they got up to. Sonomi Daidouji came across as being a very clean lady, leading to several media groups speculating that it was too good to be true. This was especially the case since her daughter appeared to be almost saintly.

A couple of hours later, sure no one would be inside, wearing a combination of khaki and reddish-grey clothes, the reporter sidled along the edge of the estate that was the desired target. Checking the railings at various intervals a reasonable gap for their physique finally turned up, allowing entry after some straining.

Who is this figure who's so fixated on getting an exposé on the Daidouji family?
14531221222223.title: Yes, M'Lady?

choices: The guest room where Sakura would stay over sometimes.
145312212222232.content:
Having just managed to squeeze her way through the railings our reporter momentarily skulked in the bushes, checking for any indications that someone may have spotted her but also to try and identify anything of interest. After a few minutes she concluded that there was nothing she could find from this position that wouldn't be better off in a Home & Garden magazine.

Sneaking from bush to bush, checking every which way for any indications that someone could've noticed her antic, she finally found a side door she could slip through. Making her way through the downstairs area, quickly secluding herself any time a maid passed by, she found nothing that was really worth mentioning. It was clear that any serious journalistic dirt would be found in the more personal spaces.

The hard part was getting up the stairs as there was nowhere to hide during the climb. The biggest challenge to her mind, however, was which room had the best chance of providing the information she was so desperate to access. She found herself beginning to feel rather uneasy, like someone had been watching her ever since she came into the hall, even though there was no sign of anyone since she tried the lounge.

She wondered if she was getting close to her find as the unease built ever higher as she approached one door. With a furtive glance around to make sure no one could see her she swiftly opened the door and slipped in, almost slamming the door shut. But, just as she began to turn and survey the room, a sudden sense of vertigo washed over her and she felt herself spinning and tumbling through the air.

As she came to this reporter looked around at the grand expanse of some epic chamber until she noticed some familiar objects that resembled immense facsimiles of furniture. It took her a while but, when nothing she could do made any difference to how it all appeared, she could only conclude that something, or someone, had shrunk her. Just as she felt she was about to make the discovery of her career she'd shrunk within...
145312212222232.title: Trespassers will be Miniaturised

choices: The door handle begans to turn
Voices are heard outside the door
1453122122222323.content:
...the guest room!

Judging by the rather small size of the room and how it doesn't have that much furniture around, her guess was correct. Fortunately for her, there was nobody in here at the moment.

The reporter wandered around the room before sitting down in a corner, next to the bed. How did something like this happen? And how will she get back to normal-size? She thought about leaving and presenting this situation to the others but, at this size, it would take hours to get the crews.

The reporter shook her head and thought that, at this size, maybe she could take advantage of it and use it to search in hard to reach places in order to unveil more secrets about the Daidouji family.

The reporter stood up and looked around the room. There might be something worth discovering.

Just then, she hears what sound like footsteps coming from outside. Someone must be coming!

1453311221211.content:
Sakura Kinomoto was well-known in her local town. Although she wasn't much of an academic, being only average at school in those fields, she was intensely athletic and bore a charming singing voice. Her main claim to fame was her heritage. Her father was a professor of archaeology and her mother was a beautiful model. Her family had a beautiful home on the edge of town; it was no mansion or anything but it was substantial.

Unfortunately, her family had recently gone into a financial slump. Why is this?
1453311221211.title: Start the Story

14533112212112.content:
The loss of her mother left Sakura's family in mourning; for a while things were unsettled but stable but the loss affected her father's work, meaning that the household income slumped. Sakura's elder brother thusly started to perform a variety of part-time jobs to try and get things back into balance all it did was slow the decline in their finances.

There was one thing the family bore that had great material value and, under the right circumstances, could very well recuperate their losses. What was it?
14533112212112.title: Nadeshiko's Death Caused More than Grief

choices: There's a livestock auctioneer in town who can help.

145331122121121.content:
The Kinomoto household had its own dairy cow, which they had been using to provide the most fresh milk available. But now, with the financial situation, all three of them saw no alternative but to sell up.

"She will have to be sold tomorrow." Fujitaka mentioned as they discussed it.

"She has many more years," Touya added, "She'd fetch a good price." Sakura listened to this and weighed up the loss of a domestic animal with the need for extra money.

"Well," She mused, "There'll be many farmers interested in a cow like her."

"There's just one problem." Fujitaka stated. "I've got a lecture tomorrow and plenty of catching up in order for us to recuperate our losses."

"And I can't sell her off," Touya mentioned, "I've got work to do." This left them with only one option.

"But," Sakura spoke up, "I can't sell her. I don't know how to make a sale." What do they say to this? That...
145331122121121.title: Sell the Cow

1453311221211212.content:
"Don't worry, Sakura-san," Fujitaka reassured her, "We can write out a few pointers for you tonight." Sakura brightened at this and accepted, in return for one chore rotation with Touya.

The next morning Sakura got up early to revise her notes and to see her father and brother off. Once she had washed the breakfast dishes she got the cow out of the cowshed and tied her to a fencepost where passersby could see her. There was already a sign up advertising the sale. It read: FINE DAIRY COW FOR SALE. ¥360,000 OR BEST OFFER. Time and again persons made offers that did not exceed ¥100,000 and some even offered bags containing no money or valuables that Sakura could easily sense as being swindles. The one figure came forth with an offer that Sakura felt had more to it that met the eye. Who was it?
